Source code for toolkit5G.ChannelModels.parameterGenerator.parameterGenerator

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from .genChannelParamPerState import GenerateChannelParametersPerState

import sys
sys.path.append("../../../")
from toolkit5G.ChannelModels.nodeMobility.nodeMobility  import NodeMobility
from toolkit5G.ChannelModels.antennaArrays.antennaArray import AntennaArrays
from toolkit5G.ChannelModels.channelGenerator.channelGenerator import ChannelGenerator
from toolkit5G.Utils.randsc  import randsc
from toolkit5G.Utils.randnsc import randnsc



[docs]class ParameterGenerator:
    # pylint: disable=line-too-long
    r"""
    A class to generate cluster level channel parameters for all the links specified in the simulation.

    
    Parameters
    ----------
    fc : int or float or NumPy.ndarray of int or float
        Carrier Frequency in GHz. Must be positive.
    terrain : str or NumPy.ndarray of str
        Propagation scenario/terrain. When passed as a numpy array it takes a shape of (3,).
        i.e., array of 3 terrain each correspond to BS-UE, UE-UE and BS-BS links respectively.
    locBS : NumPy.ndarray of int or float    
        Specifies the locations of Base Stations (BSs). Must be a three dimensional numpy array of shape (numSnapShots,numBS,3).
    locUE : NumPy.ndarray of int or float
        Specifies the locations of User Equpiments (UEs). Must be a three dimensional numpy array of shape (numSnapShots,numUE,3).                 
    d3D : None or NumPy.ndarray of int or float
        Specify the node to node 3D distance array of shape (numSnapShots,numNodes,numNodes), where numNodes = number of BSs + number of UEs.
        Defaults to None.
    d2D : None or NumPy.ndarray of int or float
        Specify the node to node 2D distance array of shape (numSnapShots,numNodes,numNodes).
        Defaults to None.
    hallVolume : int or float
        Volume of the hall in cubic meters. Defaults to 1. Valid only for indoor terrain.
    surfaceArea : int or float
        Surface area of the the hall in square meters. Defaults to 1. Also vaild for indoor terrain.
    avgBuildingHeight : int or float
        Average building height in meters. Useful in computation of path loss. Defaults to 5 meter. 
    avgStreetWidth : int or float
        Average street width in meters. Also useful in compuation of path loss. Defaults to 5 meter.
    BSvelocityVector : None or NumPy.ndarray of int or float
        Array of velocities of each BS in simulation with shape (numSnapShots, numBSs, 3), where numSnapShots correspond to number of snap-shots, numBSs correspond to number of BSs in simulation.
    bsOrientation : None or NumPy.ndarray of int or float
        Array of orientation angle of each BS in simulation with shape (numSnapShots, numBSs, 3). 
    UEvelocityVector : None or NumPy.ndarray of int or float
        Array of velocities of each UE in simulation with shape (numSnapShots, numUEs, 3), where numUEs correspond to number of UEs in simulation.
    ueOrientation : None or NumPy.ndarray of int or float
        Array of orientation angle of each UE in simulation with shape (numSnapShots, numUEs, 3).
    ueAntennaArray : None or NumPy.ndarray of AntennaArrays
        Vector of AntennaArrays object at each Rx node or UE side with shape of (numOfCarrierFrequencies,).
    bsAntennaArray : None or NumPy.ndarray of AntennaArrays
        Vector of AntennaArrays object at each Tx node or BS side with shape of (numOfCarrierFrequencies,).
    timeInstances : None or NumPy.ndarray of int or float
        specifies the time instant of each snap-shot in the simulation with shape (numSnapShots,).
    memoryEfficient : bool
        A boolean variable to enable/disable memory efficient computations. If this variable is true, then the implementation uses less memory/RAM but slows down the execution.
        Defaults to False.
    enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs : bool
        A boolean variable to enable/disable spatial consistency among LSPs. Defaults to False.
    enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs : bool
        A boolean variable to enable/disable spatial consistency among SSPs. Defaults to False.
    enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases : bool
        A boolean variable to enable/disable spatial consistency among inital phases. Defaults to False.          


    Input
    -----
    linkStateVec : NumPy.ndarray
        A numpy array specifying the state (i.e., "LOS" or "NLOS") of each node to node link. Shape (numSnapShots,numNodes,numNodes), 
        where numNodes = number of BSs + number of UEs.
    delaySpread : int or float
        Delay Spread value in sec for link level simulations.
        Must be an int or a float. Defaults to 100 nanosec.
    muKdB : int or float
            Mean of K-factor in dB. K-factor in dB is a normal random variable with mean muKdB and variance sigmaKdB respectively. 
            Must be an int or a float. Defaults to 7 dB. Ref: Table 7.5.6 of TR 38.901.
    sigmaKdB : int or float
        Variance of K-factor in dB.
        Must be an int or a float. Defaults to 4. Ref: Table 7.5.6 of TR 38.901.
    angularSpreadAoD : int or float
        Departure angular spread in Azimuth direction to generate absolute angles.
        Absolute angle is typically the angle seen by a base station in the direction of a particular UE.
        Must be a positive int or a float in degree. Defaults to 25 degree.
    angularSpreadAoA : int or float
        Arrival angular spread in Azimuth direction to generate absolute angles.
        Must be a positive int or a float in degrees. Defaults to 60 degree.
    muLog10 : int or float
        Correspond to (Log base 10 of) mean of absolute delays.
        Absolute delays correspond to delays generated by subtracting each delay value from the non-zero delay of the first tap of channel impulse response.
        This parameter is relevant for NLOS link level channels (i.e., TDL and CDL models) when absolute time of arrival (TOA) is enabled.
        These are typically log-normal random variables with mean muLog10 and variance sigmaLog10.   
        Must be a positive number and defaults to -7.5.
        Users must pass this value when ``enableAbsoluteDelays`` flag is set to True.
    sigmaLog10 : int or float
        Correspond to (Log base 10 of) variance of absolute delays.
        Must be a positive number and defaults to 0.4.
        Users must pass this value when ``enableAbsoluteDelays`` flag is set to True.
    enableAbsoluteAngles : bool
        A boolean flag specifying whether to enable or disable absolute angles between each node in the simulation.
        Must be a boolean. Defaults to True.    
    enableAbsoluteDelays : bool
        A boolean flag specifying whether to enable or disable absolute delays in the simulation.
        Must be a boolean. Defaults to True. 
        

    Attributes
    ----------
    phiAoA_LoS : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Line of Sight (LOS) Arrival angle (deg) in Azimuth direction.
    phiAOD_LOS : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Line of Sight (LOS) Departure angle (deg) in Azimuth direction.
    shadowFading : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Shadow Fading in dB.
    kFactor : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Rician K-factor in dB.
    delaySpread : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Delay Spread in sec.         
    numClusters : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Number of Clusters per each link in simulation.
    zeta : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Shadowing standard deviation per cluster in dB. 
    cASA : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Cluster Azimuth angular Spread of Arrival angle in deg.       
    cASD : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Cluster Azimuth angular Spread of Departure angle in deg.
    cZSA : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Cluster Zenith angular Spread of Arrival angle in deg.
    cDS : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Cluster Delay Spread in nano sec.                       
    phiAoA_mn : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs, number of rays per cluster, number of cluster).
        Azimuth angle Of Arrival corresponding to each ray m with in a cluster n.  
    phiAoD_mn : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs, number of rays per cluster, number of cluster).
        Azimuth angle Of Departure corresponding to each ray m with in a cluster n. 
    thetaAoD_mn : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs, number of rays per cluster, number of cluster).
        Zenith angle Of Departure corresponding to each ray m with in a cluster n.
    thetaAoA_mn : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs, number of rays per cluster, number of cluster).
        Zenith angle Of Arrival corresponding to each ray m with in a cluster n.              
    XPRnm : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs, number of cluster, number of rays per cluster).
        Specifies cross polarization power ratio of each ray m of each cluster n.
    pathLoss : numpy.ndarray of float having dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs).
        Path Loss in dB.
    pathPower : numpy.ndarray of float. Dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs, number of cluster or path).
        Specifies cluster or path power in dB.
    pathDelay : numpy.ndarray of float. Dimension (num of frequencies, num of snapshots, num of BSs, num of UEs, number of cluster or path including sub-clusters). 
        Specifes cluster or path delay in nano sec. 


    .. important::

        - Inputs ``muLog10``, ``sigmaLog10``, ``enableAbsoluteAngles`` and ``enableAbsoluteDelays`` are relevant only for positoning or sensing kind of scenarios where absolute TOA and/or absolute angles are required. 
        - Inputs  ``muKdB``, ``sigmaKdB``, ``angularSpreadAoD``, and ``angularSpreadAoD`` are relevant only for link level channels. i.e., under CDL or TDL channel model.                 
    
    """    
    def __init__(self, fc, terrain, locBS, locUE,  d3D = None, d2D = None, hallVolume = 1, surfaceArea =1, avgBuildingHeight = 5, avgStreetWidth = 5, BSvelocityVector = None, 
                 bsOrientation = None, UEvelocityVector = None, ueOrientation = None, ueAntennaArray = None, bsAntennaArray = None, timeInstances = None, memoryEfficient = False,
                 enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs = False, enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs = False, enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases = False):
        
        self.speedOfLight = 3*10**8
        self.fc           = fc
        self.terrain      = terrain
        self.locBS        = locBS
        self.locUE        = locUE
        
        self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS = locBS.shape[0:2] 
        self.numOfUE      =  locUE.shape[1] 

        self.d3D          = d3D
        self.d2D          = d2D

        self.hallVolume   = hallVolume             # Hall Volume in cubic meters
        self.surfaceArea  = surfaceArea            # Total Surface Area in square meters

        self.avgBuildingHeight = avgBuildingHeight # Average Building Height in meters
        self.avgStreetWidth    = avgStreetWidth    # Average Street Width in meters
        self.terrainBS_UE      = self.terrain[0]
        self.BSvelocityVector  = BSvelocityVector
        self.UEvelocityVector  = UEvelocityVector

        self.bsOrientation     = bsOrientation
        self.ueOrientation     = ueOrientation
        
        self.ueAntennaArray    = ueAntennaArray
        self.bsAntennaArray    = bsAntennaArray
        
        self.timeInstances     = timeInstances
        self.memoryEfficient   = memoryEfficient
        
        self.enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs = enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs
        self.enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs = enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs
        self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases = enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases
        
        self.setSpatialConsistencyParameters()
        

     
    def __call__(self, linkStateVec, delaySpread = 100*10**-9, muKdB = None, sigmaKdB = None, 
                 angularSpreadAoD = None, angularSpreadAoA = None, muLog10 = -7.5, 
                 sigmaLog10 = 0.4, enableAbsoluteAngles = True, enableAbsoluteDelays = True):

        numNodes  = self.numBS + self.numUE 
        d3D_BS_UE = self.d3D[:,0:self.numBS,self.numBS:numNodes]  # d3D for BS_UE links                  
        d2D_BS_UE = self.d2D[:,0:self.numBS,self.numBS:numNodes]  # d2D for BS_UE links

        # Link State Vector Corresponding to BS-UE links
        # dimension: (numSnapShots,numBS,numUE)
        self.linkStateVec_BS_UE = linkStateVec[:,0:self.numBS,self.numBS:numNodes]                 

        numCarriers             = self.fc.shape[0]  

        linkLevelTerrain = np.array(["CDL", "cdl", "TDL", "tdl"])
        
        if(self.terrainBS_UE[0:3] in linkLevelTerrain):
            
            if not(isinstance(delaySpread, (int, float, np.number))):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: Invalid value passed for delaySpread in sec. delaySpread for link level simulations must be an int or a float or a np.number and valid only for TDL or CDL channe model..!")

            if not((muKdB is None) or isinstance(muKdB, (int, float, np.number))):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: Invalid value passed for muKdB. muKdB must be an int or a float or a np.number in dB..!")

            if not((sigmaKdB is None) or isinstance(sigmaKdB, (int, float, np.number))):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: Invalid value passed for sigmaKdB. sigmaKdB must be an int or a float or a np.number in dB..!")

            if not((angularSpreadAoD is None) or (isinstance(angularSpreadAoD, (list, np.ndarray)) and (len(angularSpreadAoD)==2) and isinstance(angularSpreadAoD[0], (int, float, np.number)) and isinstance(angularSpreadAoD[1], (int, float, np.number))) or (isinstance(angularSpreadAoD, np.ndarray) and (angularSpreadAoD.size==2) and np.issubdtype(angularSpreadAoD.dtype, np.number))):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: Invalid value passed for 'angularSpreadAoD' in degree. angularSpreadAoD must be an list of 2 integers!")
                
                
            if not((angularSpreadAoA is None) or (isinstance(angularSpreadAoD, (list, np.ndarray)) and (len(angularSpreadAoA)==2) and isinstance(angularSpreadAoA[0], (int, float, np.number)) and isinstance(angularSpreadAoA[1], (int, float, np.number))) or (isinstance(angularSpreadAoA, np.ndarray) and (angularSpreadAoA.size==2) and np.issubdtype(angularSpreadAoA.dtype, np.number))):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: Invalid value passed for 'angularSpreadAoA' in degree. angularSpreadAoD must be an list of 2 integers!")

            
            if not(isinstance(muLog10, (int, float, np.number))):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: Invalid value passed for muLog10. muLog10 must be an int or a float or a np.number..!")
            
            if not(isinstance(sigmaLog10, (int, float, np.number))):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: Invalid value passed for sigmaLog10. sigmaLog10 must be an int or a float or a np.number..!")
          

            self.enableAbsoluteAngles = enableAbsoluteAngles
            self.enableAbsoluteDelays = enableAbsoluteDelays
            
            self.setLinkLevelParameters(delaySpread, muKdB, sigmaKdB)
            self.generateLinkLevelParameters(angularSpreadAoD, angularSpreadAoA, muLog10, sigmaLog10)
            
        else:
            self.numRaysPerCluster = 20

        #----------------------------------- Generate LoS Parameters ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
            if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs or self.enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
                chParmPerStateObj = GenerateChannelParametersPerState(self.fc, self.terrain, self.numSnapShots, self.numBS, 
                                                                      self.numUE, self.hallVolume, self.surfaceArea,
                                                                      self.avgBuildingHeight, self.avgStreetWidth,
                                                                      self.memoryEfficient, 
                                                                      self.enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs,
                                                                      self.enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs, 
                                                                      self.correlationDistance[:,0], self.correlationType[:,0])
                
            else:
                chParmPerStateObj = GenerateChannelParametersPerState(self.fc, self.terrain, self.numSnapShots, self.numBS, 
                                                                      self.numUE, self.hallVolume, self.surfaceArea,
                                                                      self.avgBuildingHeight, self.avgStreetWidth)

            # Generating LOS Angles
            chParmPerStateObj.generateLOSangles(self.locBS,self.locUE)
            self.phiAoA_LoS   = chParmPerStateObj.phi_LOS_AOA
            self.phiAoD_LoS   = chParmPerStateObj.phi_LOS_AOD
            self.thetaAoA_LoS = chParmPerStateObj.theta_LOS_ZOA
            self.thetaAoD_LoS = chParmPerStateObj.theta_LOS_ZOD

    #------------------------------------ Mapping Parameters to linkState Vector -----------------------------------------------------------------------

            # Indices Generation
            if (np.all(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE)):

                chParmPerStateObj(d3D_BS_UE, d2D_BS_UE, self.locBS, self.locUE, "LOS")  

                # Updating LSPs                      
                self.shadowFading    = chParmPerStateObj.sf          
                self.kFactor         = chParmPerStateObj.Kfactor
                self.delaySpread     = chParmPerStateObj.ds
                self.phiAoD_spread   = chParmPerStateObj.asd
                self.phiAoA_spread   = chParmPerStateObj.asa
                self.thetaAoD_spread = chParmPerStateObj.zsd
                self.thetaAoA_spread = chParmPerStateObj.zsa


                # Updating SSPs
                self.numClusters  = chParmPerStateObj.numClusters
                self.Rtau         = chParmPerStateObj.Rtau
                self.zeta         = chParmPerStateObj.zeta
                self.cASA         = chParmPerStateObj.cASA
                self.cASD         = chParmPerStateObj.cASD   
                self.cZSA         = chParmPerStateObj.cZSA 
                self.cDS          = chParmPerStateObj.cDS[:,np.newaxis,np.newaxis,np.newaxis]

                # Updating Cluster Delays                           
                self.pathDelay        = chParmPerStateObj.tau_n

                # Updating Cluster Powers                      
                self.pathPower   = chParmPerStateObj.PnUpdated
                
#                 Kr = (np.power(10, self.kFactor/10))
                
#                 self.pathPower[...,0]   = self.pathPower[...,0]*np.sqrt(Kr/(1+Kr))
#                 self.pathPower[...,1::] = self.pathPower[...,1::]*np.sqrt(1/(1+Kr))[...,np.newaxis]

                # Updating Arrival and Departure Angles                                 
                self.phiAoA_mn   = chParmPerStateObj.phi_nm_AOA 
                self.phiAoD_mn   = chParmPerStateObj.phi_nm_AOD 
                self.thetaAoA_mn = chParmPerStateObj.theta_nm_ZOA 
                self.thetaAoD_mn = chParmPerStateObj.theta_nm_ZOD 

                # Updating XPRs                     
                muXPR_dB, sigmaXPR_dB = chParmPerStateObj.genXPR("LOS")

                if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                    obj = randnsc(shape               = (chParmPerStateObj.numClusters, 20),
                                  correlationType     = self.correlationType[17,0],
                                  correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[17,0],
                                  memoryEfficeint     = True)
                    self.XPRnm = np.power(10, (sigmaXPR_dB*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS).transpose(2,3,4,0,1) + muXPR_dB)/10, dtype = np.float32)
                else:
                    
                    self.XPRnm = np.power(10, (sigmaXPR_dB*np.random.randn(self.numSnapShots, self.numBS, self.numUE, chParmPerStateObj.numClusters, 20) + muXPR_dB)/10, dtype = np.float32)

                # Updating PathLoss           
                self.pathLoss  = chParmPerStateObj.pathLoss 
                
                self.generateSCMLoSParameters()


            elif(np.all(~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE)):
                
                
                chParmPerStateObj.correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[:,1]
                chParmPerStateObj.correlationType     = self.correlationType[:,1]
                chParmPerStateObj(d3D_BS_UE, d2D_BS_UE, self.locBS, self.locUE, "NLOS")  

                # Updating LSPs                      
                self.shadowFading      = chParmPerStateObj.sf          
                self.kFactor           = chParmPerStateObj.Kfactor
                self.delaySpread       = chParmPerStateObj.ds
                self.phiAoD_spread     = chParmPerStateObj.asd
                self.phiAoA_spread     = chParmPerStateObj.asa
                self.thetaAoD_spread   = chParmPerStateObj.zsd
                self.thetaAoA_spread   = chParmPerStateObj.zsa


                # Updating SSPs
                self.numClusters = chParmPerStateObj.numClusters
                self.Rtau        = chParmPerStateObj.Rtau
                self.zeta        = chParmPerStateObj.zeta
                self.cASA        = chParmPerStateObj.cASA
                self.cASD        = chParmPerStateObj.cASD   
                self.cZSA        = chParmPerStateObj.cZSA 
                self.cDS         = chParmPerStateObj.cDS

                # Updating Cluster Delays                           
                self.pathDelay       = chParmPerStateObj.tau_n

                # Updating Cluster Powers                      
                self.pathPower   = chParmPerStateObj.PnUpdated 

                # Updating Arrival and Departure Angles                                 
                self.phiAoA_mn   = chParmPerStateObj.phi_nm_AOA 
                self.phiAoD_mn   = chParmPerStateObj.phi_nm_AOD 
                self.thetaAoA_mn = chParmPerStateObj.theta_nm_ZOA 
                self.thetaAoD_mn = chParmPerStateObj.theta_nm_ZOD 

                # Updating XPRs                     
                muXPR_dB, sigmaXPR_dB = chParmPerStateObj.genXPR("NLOS")

                if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                    obj = randnsc(shape               = (chParmPerStateObj.numClusters, 20),
                                  correlationType     = self.correlationType[17,1],
                                  correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[17,1],
                                  memoryEfficeint     = True)
                    self.XPRnm = np.power(10, (sigmaXPR_dB*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS).transpose(2,3,4,0,1) + muXPR_dB)/10, dtype = np.float32)
                else:
                    
                    self.XPRnm = np.power(10, (sigmaXPR_dB*np.random.randn(self.numSnapShots, self.numBS, self.numUE, chParmPerStateObj.numClusters, 20) + muXPR_dB)/10, dtype = np.float32)

                # Updating PathLoss           
                self.pathLoss  = chParmPerStateObj.pathLoss 
                
                self.generateSCMNLoSParameters(muLog10, sigmaLog10)


            else: # i.e for all the  terrains except InF-HH


                # max num of clusters among both the states. i.e NLOS or LOS
                Nmax              =  np.maximum(self.getNumOfClusters("NLOS"), self.getNumOfClusters("LOS"))  

                ################################################################################################
                ############################# Initialization of Channel Parameters #############################
                ################################################################################################
                # LSPs
        #         self.shadowFading           = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32)
        #         self.kFactor      = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32) 
        #         self.delaySpread           = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32) 
        #         self.phiAoD_spread          = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32)
        #         self.phiAoA_spread          = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32) 
        #         self.thetaAoD_spread          = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32)
        #         self.thetaAoA_spread          = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32)  

                self.numClusters = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.uint8) 

                # SSPs
                self.Rtau        = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32) 
                self.zeta        = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32) 
                self.cASA        = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32)
                self.cASD        = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32) 
                self.cZSA        = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32) 
                self.cDS         = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32) 

                # Cluster Delays and Cluster Powers
                self.pathDelay   = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE,Nmax)) 
                self.pathPower   = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE,Nmax))

                # Cluster Angles 
                self.phiAoA_mn   = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE,Nmax,20),dtype = np.float32) 
                self.phiAoD_mn   = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE,Nmax,20),dtype = np.float32)
                self.thetaAoA_mn = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE,Nmax,20),dtype = np.float32)
                self.thetaAoD_mn = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE,Nmax,20),dtype = np.float32)

                # Cross Polarization Power Ratio
                self.XPRnm        = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE,Nmax,20),dtype = np.float32) 

                # Path Loss
                self.pathLoss     = np.zeros((numCarriers,self.numSnapShots,self.numBS,self.numUE),dtype = np.float32)  


                ################################################################################################
                ############################ Compute all the Parameters: NLOS Links ############################
                ################################################################################################
                # Updating NLOS links
                chParmPerStateObj(d3D_BS_UE, d2D_BS_UE, self.locBS, self.locUE, "NLOS")

                ################################################################################################
                ############################# Insert LSP Parameters for NLOS Links #############################
                ################################################################################################
                # Updating LSPs
                self.shadowFading    = chParmPerStateObj.sf
                self.kFactor         = chParmPerStateObj.Kfactor
                self.delaySpread     = chParmPerStateObj.ds
                self.phiAoD_spread   = chParmPerStateObj.asd
                self.phiAoA_spread   = chParmPerStateObj.asa
                self.thetaAoD_spread = chParmPerStateObj.zsd
                self.thetaAoA_spread = chParmPerStateObj.zsa


                ################################################################################################
                ############################# Insert SSP Parameters for NLOS Links #############################
                ################################################################################################
                # Updating SSPs

                self.numClusters.transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = chParmPerStateObj.numClusters

                self.Rtau.transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.Rtau
                self.zeta.transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.zeta
                self.cASA.transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.cASA
                self.cASD.transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.cASD
                self.cZSA.transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.cZSA
                self.cDS.transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]         = chParmPerStateObj.cDS

                ################################################################################################
                ######################### Insert Cluster|Ray Parameters for NLOS Links #########################
                ################################################################################################
                # Updating Cluster Delays

                self.pathDelay[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters].transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = chParmPerStateObj.tau_n.transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]


                # Updating Cluster Powers
                self.pathPower[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters].transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]    = chParmPerStateObj.PnUpdated.transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]

                # Updating Arrival and Departure Angles            
                self.phiAoA_mn[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]   = chParmPerStateObj.phi_nm_AOA.transpose( 1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] 
                self.phiAoD_mn[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]   = chParmPerStateObj.phi_nm_AOD.transpose( 1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] 
                self.thetaAoA_mn[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = chParmPerStateObj.theta_nm_ZOA.transpose( 1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] 
                self.thetaAoD_mn[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = chParmPerStateObj.theta_nm_ZOD.transpose( 1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] 

                # Updating XPRs
                ### Generating Cross Polarization Power Ratios (XPR)###
                muXPR_dB, sigmaXPR_dB = chParmPerStateObj.genXPR("NLOS")
                
                if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                    obj = randnsc(shape               = (chParmPerStateObj.numClusters, 20),
                                  correlationType     = self.correlationType[17,1],
                                  correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[17,1],
                                  memoryEfficeint     = True)
                    
                    self.XPRnm[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = np.power(10, (sigmaXPR_dB*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS).transpose(2,3,4,0,1)[np.newaxis,...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:]. transpose(1,2, 3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] + muXPR_dB)/10, dtype = np.float32)
                    
                else:
                    
                    self.XPRnm[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = np.power(10, (sigmaXPR_dB*np.random.randn(self.numBS*self.numUE*self.numSnapShots - np.count_nonzero(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE), numCarriers, chParmPerStateObj.numClusters, 20) + muXPR_dB)/10, dtype = np.float32)
                
                # Updating PathLoss
                self.pathLoss         = chParmPerStateObj.pathLoss

    #------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                # Updating LOS links 

                chParmPerStateObj(d3D_BS_UE, d2D_BS_UE, self.locBS, self.locUE, "LOS")

                # Updating LSPs                      
                self.shadowFading.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]      = chParmPerStateObj.sf.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]          
                self.kFactor.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = chParmPerStateObj.Kfactor.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
                self.delaySpread.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]      = chParmPerStateObj.ds.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
                self.phiAoD_spread.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]     = chParmPerStateObj.asd.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
                self.phiAoA_spread.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]     = chParmPerStateObj.asa.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
                self.thetaAoD_spread.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]     = chParmPerStateObj.zsd.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
                self.thetaAoA_spread.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]     = chParmPerStateObj.zsa.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]


                # Updating SSPs

                self.numClusters.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = chParmPerStateObj.numClusters
                self.Rtau.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.Rtau
                self.zeta.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.zeta
                self.cASA.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.cASA
                self.cASD.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.cASD
                self.cZSA.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]        = chParmPerStateObj.cZSA
                self.cDS.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]         = chParmPerStateObj.cDS

    #             # Updating Cluster Delays                           
                self.pathDelay[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters].transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = chParmPerStateObj.tau_n.transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]    

    #             # Updating Cluster Powers                       
                self.pathPower[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters].transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = chParmPerStateObj.PnUpdated.transpose(1,2,3,0,4 )[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
        
#                 Kr = self.kFactor.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
#                 Kr = (np.power(10, Kr/10))
                
#                 self.pathPower[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters].transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE][...,0] =  self.pathPower[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters].transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE][...,0]*np.sqrt(Kr/(1+Kr))
#                 self.pathPower[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters].transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE][...,1::] = self.pathPower[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters].transpose(1,2,3,0,4)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE][...,1::]*np.sqrt(1/(1+Kr))[...,np.newaxis]
    #             # Updating Arrival and Departure Angles

                self.phiAoA_mn[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]    = chParmPerStateObj.phi_nm_AOA.transpose( 1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] 
                self.phiAoD_mn[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]    = chParmPerStateObj.phi_nm_AOD.transpose( 1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] 
                self.thetaAoA_mn[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]  = chParmPerStateObj.theta_nm_ZOA.transpose( 1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
                self.thetaAoD_mn[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]  = chParmPerStateObj.theta_nm_ZOD.transpose( 1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] 

                # Updating XPRs
                ### Generating Cross Polarization Power Ratios (XPR)###
                muXPR_dB, sigmaXPR_dB = chParmPerStateObj.genXPR("LOS")
                
                if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):

#                     self.XPRnm[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = np.power(10, (sigmaXPR_dB*self.XPRnm[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] + muXPR_dB)/10, dtype = np.float32)
                    
                    obj = randnsc(shape               = (chParmPerStateObj.numClusters, 20),
                                  correlationType     = self.correlationType[17,0],
                                  correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[17,0],
                                  memoryEfficeint     = True)
                    self.XPRnm[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = np.power(10, (sigmaXPR_dB*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS).transpose(2,3,4,0,1)[np.newaxis,...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:]. transpose(1, 2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] + muXPR_dB)/10, dtype = np.float32)
                    
                else:
                    
                    self.XPRnm[...,0:chParmPerStateObj.numClusters,:].transpose(1,2,3,0,4,5)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = np.power(10, (sigmaXPR_dB*np.random.randn(np.count_nonzero(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE), numCarriers, chParmPerStateObj.numClusters, 20) + muXPR_dB)/10, dtype = np.float32)

                # Updating PathLoss           
                self.pathLoss.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]  = chParmPerStateObj.pathLoss.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
                
                self.generateSCMParameters(muLog10, sigmaLog10)
########################################################################################################################################################################################

    @property
    def fc(self):
        # """ Carrier or Center Frequency at which each link is being operated in the simulation. 
        #     Must be always a positive int or float or a numpy array of positive int or float \
        #     for multi-frequency simulations.
        # """
        return self.__fc
    
    @fc.setter
    def fc(self, value):
        
        if not(isinstance(value, (int, np.number, float)) or (isinstance(value, np.ndarray) and np.issubdtype(value.dtype, np.number))):
            raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'carrierFreq', 'fc' must be an integer or float or integer array or float array!")
            
        if isinstance(value, (int, np.number, float))  and (value > 0):
            self.__fc = np.array([value])

        elif isinstance(value, np.ndarray) and np.issubdtype(value.dtype, np.number) and np.all(value > 0):
            self.__fc = value

        else:
            raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'carrierFreq' 'fc' can not be negative!")     
#------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
    @property
    def terrain(self):
        # """ Link propagation scenario or terrain at which each link is being simulated. Must be a string and has to be one among 
        #     "RMa", "UMa", "UMi", "InH-OO", "InH-MO", "InF-SL", "InF-SH", "InF-DL", "InF-DH", "InF-HH" respectively.
        #     For TDL or CDL model supported value can be passed both in upper or lower case.
        #     i.e., supprted value belongs to {"cdl-a", "cdl-b", "cdl-c", "cdl-d", "cdl-e", "CDL-A", "CDL-B", "CDL-C", "CDL-D", "CDL-E",
        #     "tdl-a", "tdl-b", "tdl-c", "tdl-d", "tdl-e", "TDL-A", "TDL-B", "TDL-C", "TDL-D", "TDL-E"}. 
        # """
        return self.__terrain

    @terrain.setter
    def terrain(self, value):

        terrainSupported  = ["RMa", "UMa", "UMi", "InH-OO", "InH-MO", "InF-SL", 
                             "InF-SH", "InF-DL", "InF-DH", "InF-HH",
                             "cdl-a", "cdl-b", "cdl-c", "cdl-d", "cdl-e", 
                             "CDL-A", "CDL-B", "CDL-C", "CDL-D", "CDL-E",
                             "tdl-a", "tdl-b", "tdl-c", "tdl-d", "tdl-e",
                             "TDL-A", "TDL-B", "TDL-C", "TDL-D", "TDL-E"]
        terrainSupported2 = ["RMa", "UMa", "UMi", "InH-OO", "InH-MO", "InF-SL",
                             "InF-SH", "InF-DL", "InF-DH", "InF-HH",
                             "cdl-a", "cdl-b", "cdl-c", "cdl-d", "cdl-e", 
                             "CDL-A", "CDL-B", "CDL-C", "CDL-D", "CDL-E",
                             "tdl-a", "tdl-b", "tdl-c", "tdl-d", "tdl-e",
                             "TDL-A", "TDL-B", "TDL-C", "TDL-D", "TDL-E"]
        terrainSupported3 = ["RMa", "UMa", "UMi", "InH-OO", "InH-MO", "InF-SL", 
                             "InF-SH", "InF-DL", "InF-DH", "InF-HH",
                             "cdl-a", "cdl-b", "cdl-c", "cdl-d", "cdl-e", 
                             "CDL-A", "CDL-B", "CDL-C", "CDL-D", "CDL-E",
                             "tdl-a", "tdl-b", "tdl-c", "tdl-d", "tdl-e",
                             "TDL-A", "TDL-B", "TDL-C", "TDL-D", "TDL-E"]
        if(isinstance(value, str) and  value in terrainSupported):
            self.__terrain = np.array([value])
        elif (not(isinstance(value, np.ndarray) and np.issubdtype(value.dtype, str) and (value.ndim == 1) and (value.size == 1 or value.size == 3))):
            raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'terrain' must be a string or 3x1 1D array of strings!")

        elif (value.size == 1):
            if(value in terrainSupported):
                self.__terrain = value
            else:
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'terrain[0]' is not supported for link!")
        elif(value.size == 3):
            if not(value[0] in terrainSupported):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'terrain[0]' is not supported for BS-UE link!")
                
            if not(value[1] in terrainSupported2):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'terrain[1]' is not supported for UE-UE link!")
            
            if not(value[2] in terrainSupported3):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'terrain[2]' is not supported for BS-BS link!")
            else:
                self.__terrain = value
        else:
            raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: Invalid size of terrain! It can be string or 1D array of string with size 1 or 3")
#------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    @property
    def d3D(self):
        # """
        # Specify the node to node distances in 3D as a numpy array of shape (numSnapShots,numNodes,numNodes), where numNodes = num of BSs + num of UEs
        # """
        return self.__d3D
    
    @d3D.setter
    def d3D(self, value):

        if value is None:
            self.__d3D = self.compute_d3D()

        else:
            if not(isinstance(value, np.ndarray) and np.issubdtype(value.dtype, np.number)):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 3D distance 'd3D' must be an integer or float array!")
            else:
                self.__d3D = value
#------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------               
    @property
    def d2D(self):
        # """
        # Specify the node to node distances in 2D as a numpy array of shape (numSnapShots,numNodes,numNodes), where numNodes = num of BSs + num of UEs
        # """       
        return self.__d2D
    
    @d2D.setter
    def d2D(self, value):

        if value is None:
            self.__d2D = self.compute_d2D()

        else:
            if not(isinstance(value, np.ndarray) and np.issubdtype(value.dtype, np.number)):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 2D distance 'd2D' must be an integer or float array!")
            else:
                self.__d2D = value 
#------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    @property
    def locBS(self):
        # """specify the location of Base Stations (BSs). Must be a numpy array of int or float with 3 dimensions or shape (numSnapShots,numBS,3). 
        #    Where numSnapShots correspond to num of snapshots, numBS correspond to num of BSs respectively.
        # """
        return self.__locBS[0:self.__numSnapShotsBS]
    
    @locBS.setter
    def locBS(self, value):
        
        if not(isinstance(value, np.ndarray) and np.issubdtype(value.dtype, np.number) and (value.ndim==3) and value.shape[2]==3):
            raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: locations of BSs 'locBS' must be an array of ints or floats with number of dimensions 3! \
             i.e (numSnapShots,numBS,3)")
 
        else:
            self.__locBS = value 
            self.hBS  = self.__locBS[...,2]
            self.numBS            = self.__locBS.shape[1]       # num of BSs
            self.numSnapShots     = self.__locBS.shape[0]       # num of SnapShots across BSs   
            self.__numSnapShotsBS = self.__locBS.shape[0] 
#------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    @property
    def locUE(self):
        # """specify the location of User Equpiments (UEs). Must be a numpy array of int or float with 3 dimensions or shape (numSnapShots,numUE,3). 
        #    Where numSnapShots correspond to num of snapshots, numUE correspond to num of UEs respectively.
        # """
        return self.__locUE
    
    @locUE.setter
    def locUE(self, value):
        
        if not(isinstance(value, np.ndarray) and np.issubdtype(value.dtype, np.number) and (value.ndim==3) and value.shape[2]==3):
            raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: locations of UEs 'locUE' must be an array of ints or floats with number of dimensions 3! \
            i.e (numSnapShots,numUE,3)")
 
        else:
            numSnapShotsUE = value.shape[0]
            if(numSnapShotsUE == self.__numSnapShotsBS):
                self.__locUE = value
            elif(self.numSnapShots == 1):
                self.__locUE = value
                self.__locBS = self.__locBS.repeat(numSnapShotsUE, axis = 0)
                self.numSnapShots = numSnapShotsUE
            elif(numSnapShotsUE == 1):
                self.__locUE = self.__locBS.repeat(self.numSnapShots, axis = 0)
            else:
                print("The num of SnapShots across the BSs and UEs cannot be unequal and greater than 1..!")

            self.numUE = self.__locUE.shape[1] 
            self.hUE   = self.__locUE[...,2]

    @property
    def correlationDistance(self):
        # """ This property speicifies the Radius of Circle when UE UeDropMethod chosen is "Circular" """
        return self.__correlationDistance
   
    @correlationDistance.setter
    def correlationDistance(self, value):
        
        if isinstance(value, np.ndarray) and np.issubdtype(value.dtype, np.number): 
            if(np.any(value<=0)):
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: all values of 'correlationDistance' must be > 0!") 
            elif(value.shape == (19,3)):
                self.__correlationDistance = value.flatten()
            else:
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'correlationDistance' number array must have a shape (19,3)!")  
            
        else:
            raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'correlationDistance' must be either a scalar number or array of numbers of size 8!") 
#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                      
    @property
    def correlationType(self):
        # """ Specifies the type of spatial/geometrical correlation to be used on the generating LoS link state!"""
        return self.__correlationType

    @correlationType.setter
    def correlationType(self, value):

        typeSupported = [ "Exponential", "Gaussian", "Mixed"]  
        
        if isinstance(value, str):
            
            if(value in typeSupported):
                self.__correlationType = np.array([[value]], dtype=str).repeat(19,0).repeat(3,1)
                
            else:
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: all the values of 'correlationType' must be one of {'Exponential','Gaussian','Mixed'}!") 
                
        elif isinstance(value, np.ndarray) and value.shape == (19,3):
            
            if np.all(np.isin(value, typeSupported)):
                self.__correlationType = value
                
            else:
                raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: all the values of 'correlationType' must be one of {'Exponential','Gaussian','Mixed'}!") 

        else:
            raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'correlationType' must be either a string or a string array of shape (19,2)!") 
                      
#***********************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
    def setSpatialConsistencyParameters(self):
        
## UMi ###################################################################################
        if(self.terrain[0][0:3]=="UMi"):

            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs):
                            #<--LoS--> | <--NLoS--> | <--O2I-->
                a = np.array([[ 7,10,10], # DS
                              [ 8,10,11], # ASD
                              [ 8, 9,17], # ASA
                              [10,12, 7], # SF
                              [15,-1,-1], # K
                              [12,10,25], # ZSA
                              [12,10,25]])# ZSD

            else:
                a = -1*np.ones((7,3))

            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
                b = np.array([[12,15,15], # AoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [12,15,15], # AoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [12,15,15], # AoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [12,15,15], # AoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [12,15,15], # ZoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [12,15,15], # ZoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [12,15,15], # ZoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [12,15,15], # ZoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [12,15,15], # Cluster Delays: Xn
                              [12,15,15]])# Cluster Power: Zn


            else:
                b = -1*np.ones((10,3))


            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                c = np.array([[12,15,15], # XPR: X_{n,m}
                              [12,15,15]])# Random Phases

            else:
                c = -1*np.ones((2,3))
                
            self.__correlationDistance = np.concatenate((a,b,c), axis = 0)

## UMa ###################################################################################
        elif(self.terrain[0][0:3]=="UMa"):

            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs):
                a = np.array([[30,40,10],
                              [18,50,11],
                              [15,50,17],
                              [37,50, 7],
                              [12,-1,-1],
                              [15,50,25],
                              [15,50,25]])

            else:
                a = -1*np.ones((7,3))

            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
                b = np.array([[40,50,15], # AoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [40,50,15], # AoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [40,50,15], # AoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [40,50,15], # AoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [40,50,15], # ZoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [40,50,15], # ZoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [40,50,15], # ZoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [40,50,15], # ZoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [40,50,15], # Cluster Delays: Xn
                              [40,50,15]])# Cluster Power: Zn

            else:
                b = -1*np.ones((10,3))


            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                c = np.array([[40,50,15], # XPR: X_{n,m}
                              [40,50,15]])# Random Phases

            else:
                c = -1*np.ones((2,3))
            
            self.__correlationDistance = np.concatenate((a,b,c), axis = 0)
                
## RMa ###################################################################################

        elif(self.terrain[0][0:3]=="RMa"):

            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs):
                a = np.array([[50, 36, 36],
                              [25, 30, 30],
                              [35, 40, 40],
                              [37,120,120],
                              [40, -1, -1],
                              [15, 50, 50],
                              [15, 50, 50]])

            else:
                a = -1*np.ones((7,3))


            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
                b = np.array([[50,60,15], # AoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [50,60,15], # AoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [50,60,15], # AoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [50,60,15], # AoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [50,60,15], # ZoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [50,60,15], # ZoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [50,60,15], # ZoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [50,60,15], # ZoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [50,60,15], # Cluster Delays: Xn
                              [50,60,15]])# Cluster Power: Zn

            else:
                b = -1*np.ones((10,3))


            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                c = np.array([[50,60,15], # XPR: X_{n,m}
                              [50,60,15]])# Random Phases

            else:
                c = -1*np.ones((2,3))
            
            self.__correlationDistance = np.concatenate((a,b,c), axis = 0)
             

## InF ###################################################################################
        elif(self.terrain[0][0:3]=="InF"):

            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs):
                a = np.array([[10,10,-1],
                                                     [10,10,-1],
                                                     [10,10,-1],
                                                     [10,10,-1],
                                                     [10,-1,-1],
                                                     [10,10,-1],
                                                     [10,10,-1]])

            else:
                a = -1*np.ones((7,3))

            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
                b = np.array([[10,10,10], # AoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [10,10,10], # AoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [10,10,10], # AoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [10,10,10], # AoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [10,10,10], # ZoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [10,10,10], # ZoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [10,10,10], # ZoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [10,10,10], # ZoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [10,10,10], # Cluster Delays: Xn
                              [10,10,10]])# Cluster Power: Zn

            else:
                b = -1*np.ones((10,3))


            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                c = np.array([[10,10,10], # XPR: X_{n,m}
                              [10,10,10]])# Random Phases

            else:
                c = -1*np.ones((2,3))
            
            self.__correlationDistance = np.concatenate((a,b,c), axis = 0)
                
                
                
        
## InH ###################################################################################
        elif(self.terrain[0][0:3]=="InH"):

            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs):
                a = np.array([[ 8, 5,-1],
                              [ 7, 3,-1],
                              [ 5, 3,-1],
                              [10, 6,-1],
                              [ 4,-1,-1],
                              [ 4, 4,-1],
                              [ 4, 4,-1]])

            else:
                a = -1*np.ones((7,3))

            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
                b = np.array([[10,10,10], # AoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [10,10,10], # AoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [10,10,10], # AoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [10,10,10], # AoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [10,10,10], # ZoA-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [10,10,10], # ZoA-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [10,10,10], # ZoD-Cluster specific sign: Xn
                              [10,10,10], # ZoD-Cluster specific offset: Yn
                              [10,10,10], # Cluster Delays: Xn
                              [10,10,10]])# Cluster Power: Zn

            else:
                b = -1*np.ones((10,3))


            if(self.__enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                c = np.array([[10,10,10], # XPR: X_{n,m}
                              [10,10,10]])# Random Phases

            else:
                c = -1*np.ones((2,3))
            
            self.__correlationDistance = np.concatenate((a,b,c), axis = 0)
        else:
            self.__correlationDistance = 20*np.ones((19,3))
            
        self.correlationType = np.array([["Exponential"]]).repeat(19,0).repeat(3,1)
#---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------       
    def compute_d3D(self):
        #  Computes 3D distances between every possible node pair . dimension:(numSnapShots,numNodes,numNodes)
        nodeloc   = np.concatenate((self.locBS, self.locUE), axis= 1, dtype = np.float32)   # node locations across snapshots 
        numOfSnapShots, numNodes  = nodeloc.shape[0:2]

        return np.linalg.norm(nodeloc.repeat(numNodes,axis=-2) - np.tile(nodeloc,(1,numNodes,1)), 
                              axis=-1).reshape(numOfSnapShots, numNodes, numNodes)              
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------   
    def compute_d2D(self):
        # Computes 2D distances between every possible node pair . dimension:(numSnapShots,numNodes,numNodes)
        nodeloc   = np.concatenate((self.locBS, self.locUE), axis= 1, dtype = np.float32)   # node locations across snapshots
        numOfSnapShots, numNodes  = nodeloc.shape[0:2]

        return np.linalg.norm(nodeloc.repeat(numNodes,axis=-2) - np.tile(nodeloc,(1,numNodes,1)), 
                              axis=-1).reshape(numOfSnapShots, numNodes, numNodes)    
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    def getNumOfClusters(self,state):
  
        if self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state   == "RMa-LOS":
            return 11
        elif self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "RMa-NLOS":
            return 10  
        elif self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "UMa-LOS":
            return 12
        elif self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "UMa-NLOS":
            return 20 
        elif self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "UMi-LOS":
            return 12 
        elif self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "UMi-NLOS":
            return 19
        elif self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "InH-OO-LOS"  or self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "InH-MO-LOS":
            return 15
        elif self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "InH-OO-NLOS" or self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "InH-MO-NLOS":
            return 19
        
        elif self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state   == "InF-SL-LOS"  or self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "InF-SH-LOS"  or \
             self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state   == "InF-DL-LOS"  or self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "InF-DH-LOS"  or \
             self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state   == "InF-SL-NLOS" or self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "InF-SH-NLOS" or \
             self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state   == "InF-DL-NLOS" or self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state == "InF-DH-NLOS" or \
             self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state   == "InF-HH-LOS"  or self.terrainBS_UE+"-"+state   == "InF-HH-NLOS":
            return 25
        
        else:
            print("Invalid Terrain Passed in generating num of clusters per link..!")

                                   0.3697,   0.57  ,   0.5283, 1.1021, 1.2756,   1.5474,   1.7842,   2.0169,   2.8294,
                                   3.0219,   3.6187,   4.1067,   4.279 ,   4.7834], dtype = np.float32)

        self.pathPower = np.array([0.,  -2.2,  -4.,  -3.2,  -9.8,  -1.2, -3.4,  -5.2,  -7.6,  -3.,  -8.9   ,
                                   -9., -4.8, -5.7,  -7.5,  -1.9,  -7.6   , -12.2, -9.8, -11.4, -14.9,  
                                   -9.2, -11.3], dtype = np.float32)
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------        
    def setTDLcParameters(self):
        self.numClusters = np.int8(24)
        self.pathDelay = np.array([0.,   0.2099,   0.2219,   0.2329,   0.2176,   0.6366, 0.6448,   0.656 ,   0.6584, 
                                   0.7935,   0.8213,   0.9336, 1.2285,  1.3083,   2.1704,   2.7105,   4.2589, 
                                   4.6003,5.4902,   5.6077,   6.3065,   6.6374,   7.0427,   8.6523], dtype = np.float32)

        self.pathPower = np.array([-4.4,  -1.2,  -3.5,  -5.2,  -2.5,   0., -2.2,  -3.9,  -7.4,  -7.1, -10.7, -11.1,
                                   -5.1,  -6.8,  -8.7, -13.2, -13.9,  -13.9, -15.8, -17.1, -16., -15.7, -21.6,
                                   -22.8], dtype = np.float32)
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------        
    def setTDLdParameters(self,muKdB,sigmaKdB):
        self.numClusters = np.int8(14)
        self.pathDelay = np.array([0.,   0.,   0.035,   0.612,   1.363,   1.405,   1.804, 2.596,

        self.muKdB     = muKdB
        self.sigmaKdB  = sigmaKdB

                                   -27.8, -23.6, -24.8, -30., -27.7], dtype = np.float32)

    def setTDLeParameters(self,muKdB,sigmaKdB):
        self.numClusters = np.int8(15)

                                   1.9589,   2.6426,   3.7136, 5.4524,  12.0034,  20.6519], dtype = np.float32)

                                   -22.6, -22.3, -25.6, -20.2, -29.8, -29.2], dtype = np.float32)
