    def setLinkLevelParameters(self, delaySpread = 10**-9, muKdB = 7, sigmaKdB = 4):
        self.delaySpread = delaySpread
        
        if(self.terrainBS_UE == "cdl-a" or self.terrainBS_UE == "CDL-A"):
            self.setCDLaParameters()

        elif(self.terrainBS_UE == "cdl-b" or self.terrainBS_UE == "CDL-B"):
            self.setCDLbParameters()

        elif(self.terrainBS_UE == "cdl-c" or self.terrainBS_UE == "CDL-C"):
            self.setCDLcParameters()
            
        elif(self.terrainBS_UE == "cdl-d" or self.terrainBS_UE == "CDL-D"):
            self.setCDLdParameters()

        elif(self.terrainBS_UE == "cdl-e" or self.terrainBS_UE == "CDL-E"):
            self.setCDLeParameters(muKdB, sigmaKdB)
            
        elif(self.terrainBS_UE == "tdl-a" or self.terrainBS_UE == "TDL-A"):
            self.setTDLaParameters()
            
        elif(self.terrainBS_UE == "tdl-b" or self.terrainBS_UE == "TDL-B"):
            self.setTDLbParameters()
            
        elif(self.terrainBS_UE == "tdl-c" or self.terrainBS_UE == "TDL-C"):
            self.setTDLcParameters()
            
        elif(self.terrainBS_UE == "tdl-d" or self.terrainBS_UE == "TDL-D"):
            self.setTDLdParameters(muKdB, sigmaKdB)

        elif(self.terrainBS_UE == "tdl-e" or self.terrainBS_UE == "TDL-E"):
            self.setTDLeParameters(muKdB, sigmaKdB)
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                        
    def generateSCMParameters(self, muLog10 = -7.5, sigmaLog10=0.4):
        numClustersMax = self.numClusters.max()
        numClustersMin = self.numClusters.min()
        pathDelay = np.zeros((self.fc.size, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, 
                              self.numOfUE, numClustersMax+4), dtype=np.float64)
        
        if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
            obj = randnsc(shape               = None,
                          correlationType     = self.correlationType[15,1],
                          correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[15,1],
                          memoryEfficeint     = self.memoryEfficient)
            nlosBias =10**( muLog10 + sigmaLog10*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE])[...,np.newaxis]
        else:

            nlosBias = 10**(muLog10 + sigmaLog10*np.random.normal(size = pathDelay[0][~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE].shape))

        for nc in range(self.fc.size):

            # Delay Insertion

            ## LoS Delay Insertion

            delays = self.pathDelay[nc][self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]

            i      = np.argwhere(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., np.newaxis])
            i[:,3] = 0
            index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
            pathDelay[nc][index]= delays[...,0] + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::][self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]/(self.speedOfLight)

            i = np.argwhere(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., np.newaxis].repeat(3,-1))
            i[:,3] = i[:,3] + 1
            index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
            pathDelay[nc][index] = (delays[...,1, np.newaxis] + (self.cDS[nc][self.linkStateVec_BS_UE].reshape(-1,1))*np.array([0,1.28, 2.56])*10**-9 + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis][self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]/(self.speedOfLight)).flatten()

            i[:,3] = i[:,3] + 3
            index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
            pathDelay[nc][index] = (delays[...,2, np.newaxis] + (self.cDS[nc][self.linkStateVec_BS_UE].reshape(-1,1))*np.array([0,1.28, 2.56])*10**-9 + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis][self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]/(self.speedOfLight)).flatten()

            i = np.argwhere(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., np.newaxis].repeat(numClustersMin-3,-1))
            i[:,3] = i[:,3] + 7
            index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
            pathDelay[nc][index] = (delays[...,3:numClustersMin] + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::][self.linkStateVec_BS_UE, np.newaxis]/(self.speedOfLight)).flatten()

            ## NLoS Delay Insertion

            delays = self.pathDelay[nc][~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]

            i = np.argwhere(~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., np.newaxis].repeat(3,-1))
            index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
            pathDelay[nc][index] = (delays[..., 0, np.newaxis] + (self.cDS[nc][~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE].reshape(-1,1))*np.array([0,1.28, 2.56])*10**-9 + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis][~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]/(self.speedOfLight)).flatten()

            i[:,3] = i[:,3] + 3
            index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
            pathDelay[nc][index] = (delays[..., 1, np.newaxis] + (self.cDS[nc][~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE].reshape(-1,1))*np.array([0,1.28, 2.56])*10**-9 + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis][~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]/(self.speedOfLight)).flatten()

            i = np.argwhere(~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., np.newaxis].repeat(numClustersMax-2,-1))
            i[:,3] = i[:,3] + 6
            index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
            pathDelay[nc][index] = (delays[..., 2::] + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis][~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]/(self.speedOfLight)).flatten()

            pathDelay[nc][~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = pathDelay[nc][~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] + nlosBias

        self.pathDelay = pathDelay
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------        
    def generateSCMLoSParameters(self):
        
        pathDelay = np.zeros((self.fc.size, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE, self.numClusters+4), dtype=np.float64)
        for nc in range(self.fc.size):

            # Delay Insertion
            ## LoS Delay Insertion

            pathDelay[nc][...,0]   = self.pathDelay[nc][...,0] + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::]/(self.speedOfLight)
            pathDelay[nc][...,1:4] = self.pathDelay[nc][...,1, np.newaxis] + (self.cDS[nc].reshape(-1,1))*np.array([0,1.28, 2.56])*10**-9 + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis]/(self.speedOfLight)
            pathDelay[nc][...,4:7] = self.pathDelay[nc][...,2, np.newaxis] + (self.cDS[nc].reshape(-1,1))*np.array([0,1.28, 2.56])*10**-9 + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis]/(self.speedOfLight)
            pathDelay[nc][...,7::] = self.pathDelay[nc][...,3:self.numClusters] + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis]/(self.speedOfLight)

        self.pathDelay = pathDelay
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                        
    def generateSCMNLoSParameters(self, muLog10 = -7.5, sigmaLog10 = 0.4):
        
        
        if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
            obj = randnsc(shape               = None,
                          correlationType     = self.correlationType[15,1],
                          correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[15,1],
                          memoryEfficeint     = self.memoryEfficient)
            nlosBias= 10**( muLog10 + sigmaLog10*obj(self.locUE[0], self.locBS[0]))[np.newaxis,np.newaxis,...,np.newaxis]
        else:

            nlosBias= 10**(muLog10 + sigmaLog10*np.random.normal(size =(1, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE, 1)))
        
        
        pathDelay = np.zeros((self.fc.size, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE, self.numClusters+4), dtype=np.float64)

        for nc in range(self.fc.size):

            pathDelay[nc][...,0:3] = self.pathDelay[nc][...,0, np.newaxis] + (self.cDS[nc].reshape(-1,1))*np.array([0,1.28, 2.56])*10**-9 + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis]/(self.speedOfLight)
            pathDelay[nc][...,3:6] = self.pathDelay[nc][...,1, np.newaxis] + (self.cDS[nc].reshape(-1,1))*np.array([0,1.28, 2.56])*10**-9 + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis]/(self.speedOfLight)
            pathDelay[nc][...,6::] = self.pathDelay[nc][...,2:self.numClusters] + self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis]/(self.speedOfLight)

        self.pathDelay = pathDelay + nlosBias           
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
    def generateCDLnlosParameters(self, angularSpreadAoD = None, angularSpreadAoA = None, 
                                  muLog10 = -7.5, sigmaLog10=0.4):
        
        if angularSpreadAoD is None:
            angularSpreadAoD = np.array([self.thetaAoD_sigma, self.phiAoD_sigma])
            
        if angularSpreadAoA is None:
            angularSpreadAoA = np.array([self.thetaAoA_sigma, self.phiAoA_sigma])
            
            
            
        rayOffset = np.array([[0.0447, -0.0447, 0.1413, -0.1413, 0.2492, -0.2492, 0.3715, -0.3715, 0.5129, -0.5129, 
                               0.6797, -0.6797, 0.8844, -0.8844, 1.1481, -1.1481, 1.5195, -1.5195, 2.1551, -2.1551]])

        self.numRaysPerCluster = 20

        # Compute the normalized angle for every ray of every cluster
        self.phiAoD_mn   = self.phiAoD_mn.reshape(-1, 1)   + rayOffset*self.phiAoD_spread
        self.phiAoA_mn   = self.phiAoA_mn.reshape(-1, 1)   + rayOffset*self.phiAoA_spread
        self.thetaAoD_mn = self.thetaAoD_mn.reshape(-1, 1) + rayOffset*self.thetaAoD_spread
        self.thetaAoA_mn = self.thetaAoA_mn.reshape(-1, 1) + rayOffset*self.thetaAoD_spread

        # Random coupling of departed ray with arriving ray inside the clusters (can be done in the last as well but takes more time)
        for i in range(self.numClusters):
            index = np.random.choice(np.arange(self.numRaysPerCluster), 
                                     replace = False, size = self.numRaysPerCluster)
            self.phiAoA_mn[i]   = self.phiAoA_mn[i,index]
            self.thetaAoA_mn[i] = self.thetaAoA_mn[i,index]

        
        # Compute the absolute angle for every ray of every cluster
        if(self.enableAbsoluteAngles):
            
            aod_LoS = self.AoD(self.locBS, self.locUE)
            aoa_LoS = np.array([[[[0, np.pi]]]]) + aod_LoS*np.array([[[[-1, 1]]]])
            aoa_LoS[...,1] = ((aoa_LoS[...,1] + np.pi) % (2 * np.pi) - np.pi)*180/np.pi
            aoa_LoS[...,0] = np.where(np.logical_and(aoa_LoS[...,0]<np.pi/2, aoa_LoS[...,0]>-np.pi/2), aoa_LoS[...,0], aoa_LoS[...,0] - np.pi)*180/np.pi

            aod_LoS     = aod_LoS*180/np.pi            
            
            self.phiAoD_mn   = aod_LoS[...,[1], np.newaxis] + angularSpreadAoD[1]/self.phiAoD_sigma*(self.phiAoD_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...] - self.phiAoD_mu)
            self.phiAoA_mn   = aoa_LoS[...,[1], np.newaxis] + angularSpreadAoA[1]/self.phiAoA_sigma*(self.phiAoA_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...] - self.phiAoA_mu)
            self.thetaAoD_mn = aod_LoS[...,[0], np.newaxis] + angularSpreadAoD[0]/self.thetaAoD_sigma*(self.thetaAoD_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...] - self.thetaAoD_mu)
            self.thetaAoA_mn = aoa_LoS[...,[0], np.newaxis] + angularSpreadAoA[0]/self.thetaAoA_sigma*(self.thetaAoA_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...] - self.thetaAoA_mu)
            
        else:
            self.phiAoD_mn   = self.phiAoD_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 0).repeat(self.numOfBS, 1)
            self.phiAoA_mn   = self.phiAoA_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 0).repeat(self.numOfUE, 2)
            self.thetaAoD_mn = self.thetaAoD_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 0).repeat(self.numOfBS, 1)
            self.thetaAoA_mn = self.thetaAoA_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 0).repeat(self.numOfUE, 2)

        self.pathPower = (10**(self.pathPower/10))[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]

        self.K      = 10**(-0.5*self.xpr/10)
        
        ## Initial Random Phases
        if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
            obj = randsc(shape               = (self.numClusters, self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2),
                         correlationType     = self.correlationType[18,1],
                         correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[18,1],
                         memoryEfficeint     = True)
            
            self.xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*obj(self.locUE[0], self.locBS[0])).transpose(4,5,0,1,2,3)[np.newaxis,np.newaxis].repeat(self.fc.size, 0).repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 1)

        else:

            # Compute XPR matrix
            self.xprMtx = np.exp(1j*(2*np.random.rand(1, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, 
                                                      self.numOfUE, self.numClusters, 
                                                      self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2)-1)*np.pi).repeat(self.fc.size, 0)
            
        self.xprMtx[..., 0, 1] = self.xprMtx[..., 0, 1]*self.K
        self.xprMtx[..., 1, 0] = self.xprMtx[..., 1, 0]*self.K
                      
        ## NLoS Biases
        if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
            obj = randnsc(shape               = None,
                          correlationType     = self.correlationType[15,1],
                          correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[15,1],
                          memoryEfficeint     = self.memoryEfficient)
            nlosBias = 10**(muLog10 + sigmaLog10*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS))[...,np.newaxis]
                                 
        else:

            nlosBias = 10**(np.random.randn(self.numOfSnapShots,self.numOfBS,self.numOfUE)*sigmaLog10+muLog10)[...,np.newaxis]
                                 

        if(self.enableAbsoluteDelays):
            self.pathDelay    = np.float32((self.d3D[:,0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis]/(self.speedOfLight) + nlosBias + self.pathDelay*self.delaySpread))
        else:
            self.pathDelay    = np.float32(nlosBias + self.pathDelay*self.delaySpread)                                         
#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                  
    def generateCDLlosParameters(self, angularSpreadAoD = None, angularSpreadAoA = None):
        
        if angularSpreadAoD is None:
            angularSpreadAoD = np.array([self.thetaAoD_sigma, self.phiAoD_sigma])
            
        if angularSpreadAoA is None:
            angularSpreadAoA = np.array([self.thetaAoA_sigma, self.phiAoA_sigma])
        
        rayOffset = np.array([[0.0447, -0.0447, 0.1413, -0.1413, 0.2492, -0.2492, 0.3715, -0.3715, 0.5129, -0.5129, 
                               0.6797, -0.6797, 0.8844, -0.8844, 1.1481, -1.1481, 1.5195, -1.5195, 2.1551, -2.1551]])

        self.numRaysPerCluster = 20

        # Compute the normalized angle for every ray of every cluster
        self.phiAoD_mn   = self.phiAoD_mn.reshape(-1, 1) + rayOffset*self.phiAoD_spread
        self.phiAoA_mn   = self.phiAoA_mn.reshape(-1, 1) + rayOffset*self.phiAoA_spread
        self.thetaAoD_mn = self.thetaAoD_mn.reshape(-1, 1) + rayOffset*self.thetaAoD_spread
        self.thetaAoA_mn = self.thetaAoA_mn.reshape(-1, 1) + rayOffset*self.thetaAoD_spread

        # Random coupling of departed ray with arriving ray inside the clusters (can be done in the last as well but takes more time)
        for i in range(self.numClusters):
            index = np.random.choice(np.arange(self.numRaysPerCluster), 
                                     replace = False, size = self.numRaysPerCluster)
            self.phiAoA_mn[i]   = self.phiAoA_mn[i,index]
            self.thetaAoA_mn[i] = self.thetaAoA_mn[i,index]

        if(self.enableAbsoluteAngles):
            aod_LoS = self.AoD(self.locBS, self.locUE)
            aoa_LoS = np.array([[[[0, np.pi]]]]) + aod_LoS*np.array([[[[-1, 1]]]])
            aoa_LoS[...,1] = ((aoa_LoS[...,1] + np.pi) % (2 * np.pi) - np.pi)*180/np.pi
            aoa_LoS[...,0] = np.where(np.logical_and(aoa_LoS[...,0]<np.pi/2, aoa_LoS[...,0]>-np.pi/2), 
                                      aoa_LoS[...,0], aoa_LoS[...,0] - np.pi)*180/np.pi

            aod_LoS     = aod_LoS*180/np.pi

            # Compute the absolute angle for every ray of every cluster
            
            self.phiAoD_mn   = angularSpreadAoD[1]/self.phiAoD_sigma*(self.phiAoD_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...] - self.phiAoD_mn[...,0,0])
            self.phiAoA_mn   = angularSpreadAoA[1]/self.phiAoA_sigma*(self.phiAoA_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...] - self.phiAoA_mn[...,0,0])
            self.thetaAoD_mn = angularSpreadAoD[0]/self.thetaAoD_sigma*(self.thetaAoD_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...] - self.thetaAoD_mn[...,0,0])
            self.thetaAoA_mn = angularSpreadAoA[0]/self.thetaAoA_sigma*(self.thetaAoA_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...] - self.thetaAoA_mn[...,0,0])
            
            self.phiAoD_mn   = aod_LoS[...,[1], np.newaxis] + self.phiAoD_mn
            self.phiAoA_mn   = aoa_LoS[...,[1], np.newaxis] + self.phiAoA_mn
            self.thetaAoD_mn = aod_LoS[...,[0], np.newaxis] + self.thetaAoD_mn
            self.thetaAoA_mn = aoa_LoS[...,[0], np.newaxis] + self.thetaAoA_mn
            
            self.phiAoD_mn[...,0,:]   = aod_LoS[...,[1]].repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, axis = -1)
            self.phiAoA_mn[...,0,:]   = aoa_LoS[...,[1]].repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, axis = -1)
            self.thetaAoD_mn[...,0,:] = aod_LoS[...,[0]].repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, axis = -1)
            self.thetaAoA_mn[...,0,:] = aoa_LoS[...,[0]].repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, axis = -1)
            
        else:
            self.phiAoD_mn   = self.phiAoD_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 0).repeat(self.numOfBS, 1)
            self.phiAoA_mn   = self.phiAoA_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 0).repeat(self.numOfUE, 2)
            self.thetaAoD_mn = self.thetaAoD_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 0).repeat(self.numOfBS, 1)
            self.thetaAoA_mn = self.thetaAoA_mn[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis,...].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 0).repeat(self.numOfUE, 2)
            
            self.phiAoD_mn[...,0,:]   = self.phiAoD_mn[...,0,[0]].repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, -1)
            self.phiAoA_mn[...,0,:]   = self.phiAoA_mn[...,0,[0]].repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, -1)
            self.thetaAoD_mn[...,0,:] = self.thetaAoD_mn[...,0,[0]].repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, -1)
            self.thetaAoA_mn[...,0,:] = self.thetaAoA_mn[...,0,[0]].repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, -1)
            
            
        
        
        if self.sigmaKdB is None or self.muKdB is None:
            self.pathPower = (10**(self.pathPower/10))[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]
            
            if(self.enableAbsoluteDelays):
                self.pathDelay = np.float32((self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::]/(self.speedOfLight))[..., np.newaxis] + self.pathDelay*self.delaySpread)
            else:
                self.pathDelay = np.float32((self.pathDelay*self.delaySpread)[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ...])
        
        else:
            self.pathPower = self.pathPower[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, axis=0).repeat(self.numOfBS, axis=1).repeat(self.numOfUE, axis=2)
                                           
                                           
            if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs):
                obj = randnsc(shape               = None,
                              correlationType     = self.correlationType[4,0],
                              correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[4,0],
                              memoryEfficeint     = self.memoryEfficient)
                kfactor = np.float32(obj(self.locUE, self.locBS)*self.sigmaKdB + self.muKdB)[...,np.newaxis]

            else:

                kfactor = np.float32(np.random.randn(self.numOfSnapShots,self.numOfBS,self.numOfUE,1)*self.sigmaKdB+self.muKdB)
                                           
                                           
            
            self.pathPower[...,1::] = self.pathPower[...,1::] - kfactor + self.kFactorModel
            self.pathPower = 10**(self.pathPower/10)
            self.pathDelay = self.pathDelay[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ...]

            meanDelay = np.sum(self.pathPower*self.pathDelay, axis = -1)/np.sum(self.pathPower, axis = -1)
            rmsDelay  = np.sqrt(np.sum(self.pathPower*(self.pathDelay - meanDelay[...,np.newaxis])**2, axis = -1)/np.sum(self.pathPower, axis = -1))
            
            self.pathPower = self.pathPower[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]
            self.pathDelay = self.pathDelay/rmsDelay[...,np.newaxis]*self.delaySpread
            
            if(self.enableAbsoluteDelays):
                self.pathDelay = np.float32((self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::]/(self.speedOfLight))[..., np.newaxis] + self.pathDelay)
        
        
        self.K      = 10**(-0.5*self.xpr/10)

        # Compute XPR matrix
                                           
        if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
            obj = randsc(shape               = (self.numClusters, self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2),
                         correlationType     = self.correlationType[18,0],
                         correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[18,0],
                         memoryEfficeint     = True)
            
            self.xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*obj(self.locUE[0], self.locBS[0]).transpose(4,5,0,1,2,3))[np.newaxis,np.newaxis].repeat(self.fc.size, 0).repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 1)
            
        else:

            # Compute XPR matrix
            self.xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*(2*np.random.rand(1, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE, 
                                                            self.numClusters, 
                                                            self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2)-1)).repeat(self.fc.size, 0)                               
                                           

        self.xprMtx[..., 0, 1] = self.xprMtx[..., 0, 1]*self.K
        self.xprMtx[..., 1, 0] = self.xprMtx[..., 1, 0]*self.K
        
        lamda = (self.speedOfLight/self.fc).reshape(-1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
        
        self.xprMtx[...,0, :, 0, 0] = 1
        self.xprMtx[...,0, :, 1, 1] = -1
        self.xprMtx[...,0, :, 0, 1] = 0
        self.xprMtx[...,0, :, 1, 0] = 0
        self.xprMtx[...,0, :, :, :] = np.exp(-1j*2*np.pi*self.d3D[np.newaxis, :, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis].repeat(self.fc.size, 0)/lamda).repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, -3).repeat(2, -2).repeat(2, -1)
#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------        
    def generateTDLnlosParameters(self, muLog10 = -7.5, sigmaLog10=0.4):
        self.pathPower = (10**(self.pathPower/10))[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]
        
        if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForSSPs):
            obj = randnsc(shape               = None,
                          correlationType     = self.correlationType[15,1],
                          correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[15,1],
                          memoryEfficeint     = self.memoryEfficient)
            nlosBias = 10**(muLog10 + sigmaLog10*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS))[...,np.newaxis]

        else:

            nlosBias = 10**(np.random.randn(self.numOfSnapShots,self.numOfBS,self.numOfUE)*sigmaLog10+muLog10)[...,np.newaxis]

        self.pathDelay = (self.d3D[:,0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::]/(self.speedOfLight) + nlosBias)[...,np.newaxis]
        self.pathDelay = np.float32(self.pathDelay + self.pathDelay*self.delaySpread)                                                                          
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------       
    def generateTDLlosParameters(self):
        self.pathPower = (10**(self.pathPower/10))[np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]
        self.pathDelay = np.float32((self.d3D[:,0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::]/(self.speedOfLight))[...,np.newaxis] + self.pathDelay*self.delaySpread)
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    
    def generateLinkLevelParameters(self, angularSpreadAoD = None, angularSpreadAoA = None, muLog10 = -7.5, sigmaLog10=0.4):
        cdlNLoS = ["cdl-a", "cdl-b", "cdl-c", "CDL-A", "CDL-B", "CDL-C"]
        cdlLoS  = ["cdl-d", "cdl-e", "CDL-D", "CDL-E"]
        tdlNLoS = ["tdl-a", "tdl-b", "tdl-c","TDL-A", "TDL-B", "TDL-C"]
        tdlLoS  = ["tdl-d", "tdl-e","TDL-D", "TDL-E"]
        
            
        if(self.terrainBS_UE in cdlNLoS):
            self.generateCDLnlosParameters(angularSpreadAoD, angularSpreadAoA, muLog10, sigmaLog10)
            
        elif(self.terrainBS_UE in cdlLoS):
            self.generateCDLlosParameters(angularSpreadAoD, angularSpreadAoA)
            
        elif(self.terrainBS_UE in tdlNLoS):
            self.generateTDLnlosParameters(muLog10, sigmaLog10)
            
        elif(self.terrainBS_UE in tdlLoS):
            self.generateTDLlosParameters()
            
        else:
            raise ValueError("[Error-LinkLevelChannel]: Invalid terrain!")
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[docs]    def getChannel(self, applyPathLoss = True, memoryEfficient = False):
        """
        Method to fetch channel coefficients.
        All the channel coefficients corresponding to Tapped Delay Line (TDL), Clustered Delay Line (CDL) and Spatial Channel Model (SCM) are returned by this function. 

        Parameters
        ----------
        applyPathLoss : bool
            A boolen specifying whether to apply path loss to Spatial Channel Model (SCM) or not.
            Defaults to True corresponds to channel coefficients being computed by applying path loss and shadow fading.
            If False, it returns channel coefficients with out applying the computed path loss and shadow fading.
        memoryEfficient : bool
            Set this to true for low memory consumption.

        Returns
        -------
        Returns an object of the class `ChannelGenerator`. User can fetch OFDM channel using this object.        
        """
        if not isinstance(memoryEfficient, (bool, np.bool_)):
            raise ValueError("[Error-ParameterGenerator]: 'memoryEfficient' must be a boolean type!")
            
        self.memoryEfficient = memoryEfficient
        
        if(self.terrainBS_UE[0:3]=="tdl" or self.terrainBS_UE[0:3]=="TDL"):
            return self.getTDLchannel()
            
        elif(self.terrainBS_UE[0:3]=="cdl" or self.terrainBS_UE[0:3]=="CDL"):
            return self.getCDLchannel()
            
        else:
            if(np.all(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE)):
                return self.getSCMLoSChannel(applyPathLoss)
            
            elif(np.all(~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE)):
                return self.getSCMNLoSChannel(applyPathLoss)
            
            else:
                return self.getSCMChannel(applyPathLoss)

#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------     
    def getTDLchannel(self):
        lamda = self.speedOfLight/self.fc 
        hchannel = np.zeros((lamda.size, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE, 
                             self.numClusters, self.ueAntennaArray[0].numAntennas, 
                             self.bsAntennaArray[0].numAntennas,),
                            dtype=np.complex64)
        numCarriers = np.minimum(self.bsAntennaArray.size, self.ueAntennaArray.size)
        
        if(numCarriers != lamda.size):
            if(self.bsAntennaArray.size == 1):
                self.bsAntennaArray = self.bsAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)
            else:
                self.ueAntennaArray = self.ueAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)
        
        for nc in range(lamda.size):
            txAntLocation = self.locBS[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.bsAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)
            rxAntLocation = self.locUE[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.ueAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)

            ## Compute Reciever Stearing Vector
            rRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn, self.phiAoA_mn)[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
            dRx = rxAntLocation[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]

            ## Compute Transmitter Stearing Vector 
            rTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn, self.phiAoD_mn)[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
            dTx = txAntLocation[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]

            ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Stearing Vector + Tx Stearing Vector
            hn  = np.complex64(np.sqrt(self.pathPower/self.numRaysPerCluster)*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*((rRx@dRx)[..., 0]+(rTx@dTx)[..., np.newaxis, :, 0, 0])/lamda[nc]))

            ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Mobility + Tx Mobility
            hn  = hn*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*self.timeInstances[...,np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]/lamda[nc]*(rTx[...,0,0,:]@self.BSvelocityVector[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis] + rRx[...,0,0,:]@self.UEvelocityVector[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis])[...,np.newaxis])

            ## Apply Field Patterns
            hn  = np.sum((self.ueAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoA_mn.transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180, self.phiAoA_mn.transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180, nodeOrientation = self.ueOrientation).transpose(0,2,1,3,4,5,6)[...,:,np.newaxis,np.newaxis,:]@self.xprMtx[...,np.newaxis,np.newaxis,:,:]@self.bsAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoD_mn*np.pi/180, self.phiAoD_mn*np.pi/180, nodeOrientation = -self.bsOrientation)[...,np.newaxis,:,:,np.newaxis])[...,0, 0]*hn, axis = -3)
            hchannel[nc] = hn

        ## Load Parameters into ChannelGenerator Object
        channel = ChannelGenerator(self.fc, self.terrainBS_UE, self.locBS, self.locUE, self.BSvelocityVector, self.UEvelocityVector)
        
        channel.coefficients     = hchannel
        channel.delays           = self.pathDelay
        channel.BSvelocityVector = self.BSvelocityVector 
        channel.UEvelocityVector = self.UEvelocityVector
        
        return channel
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
    def getCDLchannel(self):
        lamda = self.speedOfLight/self.fc 
        hchannel = np.zeros((lamda.size, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE, 
                             self.numClusters, self.ueAntennaArray[0].numAntennas, 
                             self.bsAntennaArray[0].numAntennas,),
                            dtype=np.complex64)
        numCarriers = np.minimum(self.bsAntennaArray.size, self.ueAntennaArray.size)
        
        if(numCarriers != lamda.size):
            if(self.bsAntennaArray.size == 1):
                self.bsAntennaArray = self.bsAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)
            else:
                self.ueAntennaArray = self.ueAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)
        
        for nc in range(lamda.size):
            txAntLocation = self.locBS[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.bsAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)
            rxAntLocation = self.locUE[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.ueAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)

            ## Compute Reciever Stearing Vector
            rRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn, self.phiAoA_mn)[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
            dRx = rxAntLocation[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]

            ## Compute Transmitter Stearing Vector 
            rTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn, self.phiAoD_mn)[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
            dTx = txAntLocation[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]

            ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Stearing Vector + Tx Stearing Vector
            hn  = np.complex64(np.sqrt(self.pathPower/self.numRaysPerCluster)*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*((rRx@dRx)[..., 0]+(rTx@dTx)[..., np.newaxis, :, 0, 0])/lamda[nc]))

            ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Mobility + Tx Mobility
            hn  = hn*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*self.timeInstances[...,np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]/lamda[nc]*(rTx[...,0,0,:]@self.BSvelocityVector[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis] + rRx[...,0,0,:]@self.UEvelocityVector[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis])[...,np.newaxis])

            ## Apply Field Patterns
            hn  = np.sum((self.ueAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoA_mn.transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180, self.phiAoA_mn.transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180, nodeOrientation = self.ueOrientation).transpose(0,2,1,3,4,5,6)[...,:,np.newaxis,np.newaxis,:]@self.xprMtx[nc, ..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :, :]@self.bsAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoD_mn*np.pi/180, self.phiAoD_mn*np.pi/180, nodeOrientation = -self.bsOrientation)[...,np.newaxis,:,:,np.newaxis])[...,0, 0]*hn, axis = -3)
            hchannel[nc] = hn

        ## Load Parameters into ChannelGenerator Object
        channel = ChannelGenerator(self.fc, self.terrainBS_UE, self.locBS, self.locUE, self.BSvelocityVector, self.UEvelocityVector)
        
        channel.coefficients     = hchannel
        channel.delays           = self.pathDelay
        channel.BSvelocityVector = self.BSvelocityVector 
        channel.UEvelocityVector = self.UEvelocityVector
        
        return channel
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
    def getSCMLoSChannel(self, applyPathLoss = True):
        
        lamda = self.speedOfLight/self.fc 
        self.numRaysPerCluster = 20

        numCarriers = np.minimum(self.bsAntennaArray.size, self.ueAntennaArray.size)

        if(numCarriers != lamda.size):
            if(self.bsAntennaArray.size == 1):
                self.bsAntennaArray = self.bsAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)
            else:
                self.ueAntennaArray = self.ueAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)

        indices1 = np.array([0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,18,19], dtype = np.int8)
        indices2 = np.array([8,9,10,11,16,17], dtype = np.int8)
        indices3 = np.array([12,13,14,15], dtype = np.int8)

        hchannel = np.zeros((lamda.size, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE, 
                             self.numClusters.max()+4, self.ueAntennaArray[0].numAntennas, 
                             self.bsAntennaArray[0].numAntennas), dtype=np.complex64)

        for nc in range(lamda.size):
            self.XPRnm  = np.where(self.XPRnm<0.0001, np.inf, self.XPRnm)
            # self.XPRnm
                                           
        # Compute XPR matrix
                                           
            if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                obj = randsc(shape               = (self.numClusters, self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2),
                             correlationType     = self.correlationType[18,0],
                             correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[18,0],
                             memoryEfficeint     = True)

                xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*obj(self.locUE[0], self.locBS[0])).transpose(4,5,0,1,2,3)[np.newaxis].repeat( self.numOfSnapShots,0)

            else:

                # Compute XPR matrix
                xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*(2*np.random.rand(1, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE,
                                                           self.numClusters,
                                                           self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2)-1))                          

            xprMtx[..., 0, 1] = xprMtx[..., 0, 1]*np.sqrt(1/self.XPRnm)
            xprMtx[..., 1, 0] = xprMtx[..., 1, 0]*np.sqrt(1/self.XPRnm)
            
            xprMtx[...,0, :, 0, 0] = 1
            xprMtx[...,0, :, 1, 1] = -1
            xprMtx[...,0, :, 0, 1] = 0
            xprMtx[...,0, :, 1, 0] = 0
            xprMtx[...,0, :, :, :] = xprMtx[...,0, :, :, :]*np.exp(-1j*2*np.pi*self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, self.numOfBS::, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]/lamda[nc]).repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, -3).repeat(2, -2).repeat(2, -1)

            
            
            txAntLocation = self.locBS[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.bsAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)
            rxAntLocation = self.locUE[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.ueAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)

            ## Compute Reciever Stearing Vector
            rRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn[nc], self.phiAoA_mn[nc])[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
            dRx = rxAntLocation[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]

            ## Compute Transmitter Stearing Vector 
            rTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn[nc], self.phiAoD_mn[nc])[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
            dTx = txAntLocation[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]

            ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Stearing Vector + Tx Stearing Vector
            hn  = np.complex64(np.sqrt(self.pathPower[nc][...,np.newaxis,np.newaxis,np.newaxis]/self.numRaysPerCluster )*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*((rRx@dRx)[..., 0]+(rTx@dTx)[..., np.newaxis, :, 0, 0])/lamda[nc]))

            ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Mobility + Tx Mobility
            hn  = hn*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*self.timeInstances[...,np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]/lamda[nc]*(rTx[...,0,0,:]@self.BSvelocityVector[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis] + rRx[...,0,0,:]@self.UEvelocityVector[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis])[...,np.newaxis])



            ## Apply Field Patterns
            hn  = (self.ueAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoA_mn[nc].transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                              self.phiAoA_mn[nc].transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                              nodeOrientation = -self.ueOrientation).transpose(0,2,1,3,4,5,6)[...,:,np.newaxis, np.newaxis,:]@xprMtx[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :,  :]@self.bsAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoD_mn[nc]*np.pi/180, self.phiAoD_mn[nc]*np.pi/180, nodeOrientation = -self.bsOrientation)[...,np.newaxis,:,:,np.newaxis])[...,0, 0]*hn

            ## NLoS Channel Insertion
            hchannel[nc][...,0,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 0,:,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,1,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,2,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,3,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,4,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 2,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,5,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 2,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,6,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 2,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,7::,:,:] = np.sum(hn[..., 3::,:,:,:],      axis=-3)


        ## Load Parameters into ChannelGenerator Object
        channel = ChannelGenerator(self.fc, self.terrainBS_UE, self.locBS, self.locUE, self.BSvelocityVector, self.UEvelocityVector)

        
        if(applyPathLoss):
            if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs):
                obj = randnsc(shape               = self.fc.size,
                              correlationType     = self.correlationType[3,0],
                              correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[3,0],
                              memoryEfficeint     = self.memoryEfficient)
                self.pathLoss = self.pathLoss + self.shadowFading*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS)

            else:

                self.pathLoss = self.pathLoss+self.shadowFading*np.random.randn(self.fc.size, self.numOfSnapShots, 
                                                                                self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE)
                                           
            channel.coefficients = hchannel*(10**(-self.pathLoss[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]/20))  

        else:
            channel.coefficients = hchannel
            
        channel.delays           = self.pathDelay
        channel.BSvelocityVector = self.BSvelocityVector 
        channel.UEvelocityVector = self.UEvelocityVector
        
        return channel
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
    def getSCMNLoSChannel(self, applyPathLoss = True):
        
        lamda = self.speedOfLight/self.fc
        numCarriers = np.minimum(self.bsAntennaArray.size, self.ueAntennaArray.size)

        if(numCarriers != lamda.size):
            if(self.bsAntennaArray.size == 1):
                self.bsAntennaArray = self.bsAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)
            else:
                self.ueAntennaArray = self.ueAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)

        indices1 = np.array([0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,18,19], dtype = np.int8)
        indices2 = np.array([8,9,10,11,16,17], dtype = np.int8)
        indices3 = np.array([12,13,14,15], dtype = np.int8)

        hchannel = np.zeros((lamda.size, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE, 
                             self.numClusters.max()+4, self.ueAntennaArray[0].numAntennas, 
                             self.bsAntennaArray[0].numAntennas), dtype=np.complex64)

        for nc in range(lamda.size):
            self.XPRnm  = np.where(self.XPRnm<0.0001, np.inf, self.XPRnm)
            # self.XPRnm
                                
            # Compute XPR matrix
            if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                obj = randsc(shape               = (self.numClusters.max(), self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2),
                             correlationType     = self.correlationType[18,1],
                             correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[18,1],
                             memoryEfficeint     = True)

                xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*obj(self.locUE[0], self.locBS[0]).transpose(4,5,0,1,2,3))[np.newaxis].repeat( self.numOfSnapShots,0)

            else:

                # Compute XPR matrix      
                xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*(2*np.random.rand(self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE,
                                                           self.numClusters.max(),  
                                                           self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2)-1))

            xprMtx[..., 0, 1] = xprMtx[..., 0, 1]*np.sqrt(1/self.XPRnm)
            xprMtx[..., 1, 0] = xprMtx[..., 1, 0]*np.sqrt(1/self.XPRnm)
            
            txAntLocation = self.locBS[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.bsAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)
            rxAntLocation = self.locUE[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.ueAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)

            ## Compute Reciever Stearing Vector
            rRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn[nc], self.phiAoA_mn[nc])[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
            dRx = rxAntLocation[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]

            ## Compute Transmitter Stearing Vector 
            rTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn[nc], self.phiAoD_mn[nc])[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
            dTx = txAntLocation[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]

            ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Stearing Vector + Tx Stearing Vector
            hn  = np.complex64(np.sqrt(self.pathPower[nc][...,np.newaxis,np.newaxis,np.newaxis]/self.numRaysPerCluster)*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*((rRx@dRx)[..., 0]+(rTx@dTx)[..., np.newaxis, :, 0, 0])/lamda[nc]))

            ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Mobility + Tx Mobility
            hn  = hn*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*self.timeInstances[...,np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]/lamda[nc]*(rTx[...,0,0,:]@self.BSvelocityVector[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis] + rRx[...,0,0,:]@self.UEvelocityVector[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis])[...,np.newaxis])



            ## Apply Field Patterns
            hn  = (self.ueAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoA_mn[nc].transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                              self.phiAoA_mn[nc].transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                              nodeOrientation = self.ueOrientation).transpose(0,2,1,3,4,5,6)[...,:,np.newaxis, np.newaxis,:]@xprMtx[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :,  :]@self.bsAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoD_mn[nc]*np.pi/180, self.phiAoD_mn[nc]*np.pi/180, nodeOrientation = -self.bsOrientation)[...,np.newaxis,:,:,np.newaxis])[...,0, 0]*hn

            ## NLoS Channel Insertion
            hchannel[nc][...,0,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 0,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,1,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 0,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,2,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 0,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,3,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,4,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,5,:,:]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)
            hchannel[nc][...,6::,:,:] = np.sum(hn[..., 2::,:,:,:],      axis=-3)


        ## Load Parameters into ChannelGenerator Object
        channel = ChannelGenerator(self.fc, self.terrainBS_UE, self.locBS, self.locUE, self.BSvelocityVector, self.UEvelocityVector)
        
        if(applyPathLoss):
            if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs):
                obj = randnsc(shape               = self.fc.size,
                              correlationType     = self.correlationType[3,1],
                              correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[3,1],
                              memoryEfficeint     = self.memoryEfficient)
                self.pathLoss = self.pathLoss + self.shadowFading*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS)

            else:

                self.pathLoss = self.pathLoss+self.shadowFading*np.random.randn(self.fc.size, self.numOfSnapShots, 
                                                                                self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE)
                                           
            channel.coefficients = hchannel*(10**(-self.pathLoss[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]/20))
        else:
            channel.coefficients = hchannel
            
        channel.delays           = self.pathDelay
        channel.BSvelocityVector = self.BSvelocityVector 
        channel.UEvelocityVector = self.UEvelocityVector
        
        return channel
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
    def getSCMChannel(self, applyPathLoss = True):

        lamda = self.speedOfLight/self.fc 
        numCarriers = np.minimum(self.bsAntennaArray.size, self.ueAntennaArray.size)

        if(numCarriers != lamda.size):
            if(self.bsAntennaArray.size == 1):
                self.bsAntennaArray = self.bsAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)
            else:
                self.ueAntennaArray = self.ueAntennaArray.repeat(lamda.size)

        indices1 = np.array([0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,18,19], dtype = np.int8)
        indices2 = np.array([8,9,10,11,16,17], dtype = np.int8)
        indices3 = np.array([12,13,14,15], dtype = np.int8)

        hchannel = np.zeros((lamda.size, self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE, 
                             self.numClusters.max()+4, self.ueAntennaArray[0].numAntennas, 
                             self.bsAntennaArray[0].numAntennas), dtype=np.complex64)

        if(not self.memoryEfficient):

            for nc in range(lamda.size):
                self.XPRnm  = np.where(self.XPRnm<0.0001, np.inf, self.XPRnm)
                # self.XPRnm
                # Compute XPR matrix
                if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                    obj = randsc(shape               = (self.numClusters.max(), self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2),
                                 correlationType     = self.correlationType[18,1],
                                 correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[18,1],
                                 memoryEfficeint     = True)

                    xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*obj(self.locUE[0], 
                                                 self.locBS[0]).transpose(4,5,0,1,2,3))[np.newaxis].repeat(self.numOfSnapShots, 0)

                else:

                    # Compute XPR matrix      
                    xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*(2*np.random.rand(self.numOfSnapShots, self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE,
                                                               self.numClusters.max(),  
                                                               self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2)-1))


                xprMtx[..., 0, 1] = xprMtx[..., 0, 1]*np.sqrt(1/self.XPRnm[nc])
                xprMtx[..., 1, 0] = xprMtx[..., 1, 0]*np.sqrt(1/self.XPRnm[nc])

                index = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*np.argwhere(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., 
                                                                                     np.newaxis,
                                                                                     np.newaxis].repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster,-1))))))
                xprMtx[index] = (np.array([[1,0],[0,-1]])[np.newaxis,...]*np.exp(-1j*2*np.pi*self.d3D[:, 0:self.numOfBS, 
                                                                                                      self.numOfBS::, 
                                                                                                      np.newaxis, np.newaxis][self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]/lamda[nc]).repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, 0))

                txAntLocation = self.locBS[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.bsAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)
                rxAntLocation = self.locUE[...,np.newaxis,:] + self.ueAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1,3)

                ## Compute Reciever Stearing Vector
                rRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn[nc], self.phiAoA_mn[nc])[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
                dRx = rxAntLocation[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]

                ## Compute Transmitter Stearing Vector 
                rTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn[nc], self.phiAoD_mn[nc])[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :]
                dTx = txAntLocation[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, ..., np.newaxis]         

                ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Stearing Vector + Tx Stearing Vector
                hn  = np.complex64(np.sqrt(self.pathPower[nc][...,np.newaxis,np.newaxis,np.newaxis]/self.numRaysPerCluster)* np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*((rRx@dRx)[..., 0]+(rTx@dTx)[..., np.newaxis, :, 0, 0])/lamda[nc]))

                ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Mobility + Tx Mobility
                hn  = hn*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*self.timeInstances[...,np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]/lamda[nc]*(rTx[...,0,0,:]@self.BSvelocityVector[:, :, np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis] + rRx[...,0,0,:]@self.UEvelocityVector[:, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis, :, np.newaxis])[...,np.newaxis])

                ## Apply Field Patterns
                hn  = (self.ueAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoA_mn[nc].transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                                  self.phiAoA_mn[nc].transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                                  nodeOrientation = -self.ueOrientation). transpose(0,2,1,3,4,5,6)[...,:,np.newaxis, np.newaxis,:]@xprMtx[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :,  :]@ self.bsAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoD_mn[nc]*np.pi/180, self.phiAoD_mn[nc]*np.pi/180, nodeOrientation = -self.bsOrientation)[...,np.newaxis,:,:,np.newaxis])[...,0, 0]*hn

                h = hn[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]

                i      = np.argwhere(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., np.newaxis])
                i[:,3] = 0
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 0,:,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 1
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 1,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 2
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 1,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 3
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 1,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 4
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 2,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 5
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 2,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 6
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 2,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)

                i      = np.argwhere(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., np.newaxis].repeat(self.numClusters.max()-3,-1))
                i[:,3] = i[:,3] + 7
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                i[:,3] = i[:,3] - 4
                index2 = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(hn[index2], axis=-3)

                ## NLoS Channel Insertion
                h      = hn[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]

                i      = np.argwhere(~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., np.newaxis])
                i[:,3] = 0
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 0,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 1
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 0,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 2
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 0,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 3
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 1,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 4
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 1,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)

                i[:,3] = 5
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(h[..., 1,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)

                i      = np.argwhere(~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[..., np.newaxis].repeat(self.numClusters.max()-2,-1))
                i[:,3] = i[:,3] + 6
                index  = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                i[:,3] = i[:,3] - 4
                index2 = tuple(np.array(list(zip(*i))))
                hchannel[nc][index] = np.sum(hn[index2], axis=-3)

        else:
            self.XPRnm  = np.where(self.XPRnm<0.0001, np.inf, self.XPRnm)

            for nc in range(lamda.size):
                                    
                # Compute XPR matrix
                if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                    obj = randsc(shape               = (self.numClusters.max(), self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2),
                                 correlationType     = self.correlationType[18,1],
                                 correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[18,1],
                                 memoryEfficeint     = True)

                    xprMtxO = np.exp(1j*np.pi*obj(self.locUE[0],self.locBS[0])).transpose(4,5,0,1,2,3)
                                     
                for ns in range(self.numOfSnapShots):
                    for nbs in range(self.numBS):
                        for nue in range(self.numOfUE):


                            txAntLocation     = self.locBS[ns,nbs,np.newaxis,:] + self.bsAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1, 3)
                            rxAntLocation     = self.locUE[ns,nue,np.newaxis,:] + self.ueAntennaArray[nc].locations.reshape(-1, 3)

                            ## Compute Reciever Stearing Vector
                            rRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn[nc,ns,nbs,nue], self.phiAoA_mn[nc,ns,nbs,nue])[...,np.newaxis, np.newaxis,:]
                            dRx = rxAntLocation[np.newaxis,np.newaxis,:,:,np.newaxis]

                            ## Compute Transmitter Stearing Vector 
                            rTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn[nc,ns,nbs,nue], self.phiAoD_mn[nc,ns,nbs,nue])[...,np.newaxis, np.newaxis,:]
                            dTx = txAntLocation[np.newaxis,np.newaxis,:,:,np.newaxis]


                            if(self.linkStateVec_BS_UE[ns,nbs,nue]):
                                
                                # self.XPRnm
                                xprMtx = np.array([[1,0],[0,-1]])[np.newaxis, np.newaxis].repeat(self.numClusters.max(), axis =0).repeat(self.numRaysPerCluster, axis =1)
                                xprMtx = xprMtx*np.exp(-1j*2*np.pi*self.d3D[ns,nbs,self.numOfBS+nue]/lamda[nc])

                                ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Stearing Vector + Tx Stearing Vector
                                hn  = np.complex64(np.sqrt(self.pathPower[nc,ns,nbs,nue].reshape(-1,1,1,1)/ self.numRaysPerCluster)*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*((rRx@dRx)[..., 0]+(rTx@dTx)[..., np.newaxis, :, 0, 0])/lamda[nc]))

                                ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Mobility + Tx Mobility
                                hn  = hn*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*self.timeInstances[ns]/lamda[nc]*(rTx[...,0,0,:]@self.BSvelocityVector[ns,nbs] + rRx[...,0,0,:]@self.UEvelocityVector[ns,nue]))[...,np.newaxis,np.newaxis]

                                ## Apply Field Patterns
                                hn  = (self.ueAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoA_mn[nc,[ns],[[nbs]],[[[nue]]]]. transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                                               self.phiAoA_mn[nc,[ns],[[nbs]],[[[nue]]]]. transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                                               nodeOrientation = self.ueOrientation[ns,[[nue]]]).transpose(0,2,1,3,4,5,6)[0,0,0,..., np.newaxis,np.newaxis,:]@xprMtx[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :,  :]@self.bsAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoD_mn[nc,[ns],[[nbs]],[[[nue]]]]*np.pi/180, self.phiAoD_mn[nc,[ns],[[nbs]],[[[nue]]]]*np.pi/180, nodeOrientation = -self.bsOrientation[ns,[[nbs]]])[0,0,0,...,np.newaxis,:,:,np.newaxis])[...,0, 0]*hn
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,0,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 0,:,:,:],        axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,1,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,2,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,3,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,4,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 2,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,5,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 2,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,6,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 2,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,7::,...] = np.sum(hn[..., 3::,:,:,:],      axis=-3)

                            else:

                                # self.XPRnm
                                if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForInitialPhases):
                                    xprMtx = xprMtxO[nbs, nue]
                                else:
                                    xprMtx = np.exp(1j*np.pi*(2*np.random.rand(self.numClusters.max(), 
                                                                               self.numRaysPerCluster, 2, 2)-1))

                                xprMtx[..., 0, 1] = xprMtx[..., 0, 1]*np.sqrt(1/self.XPRnm[nc,ns,nbs,nue])
                                xprMtx[..., 1, 0] = xprMtx[..., 1, 0]*np.sqrt(1/self.XPRnm[nc,ns,nbs,nue])
                                
                                ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Stearing Vector + Tx Stearing Vector
                                hn  = np.complex64(np.sqrt(self.pathPower[nc,ns,nbs,nue].reshape(-1,1,1,1)/self.numRaysPerCluster)*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*((rRx@dRx)[..., 0]+(rTx@dTx)[..., np.newaxis, :, 0, 0])/lamda[nc]))

                                ## Apply Doppler Phasors: Rx Mobility + Tx Mobility
                                hn  = hn*np.exp(1j*2*np.pi*self.timeInstances[ns]/lamda[nc]*(rTx[...,0,0,:]@self.BSvelocityVector[ns,nbs] + rRx[...,0,0,:]@self.UEvelocityVector[ns,nue]))[...,np.newaxis,np.newaxis]

                                ## Apply Field Patterns
                                hn  = (self.ueAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoA_mn[nc,[ns],[[nbs]],[[[nue]]]].transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                                                   self.phiAoA_mn[nc,[ns],[[nbs]],[[[nue]]]].transpose(0,2,1,3,4)*np.pi/180,
                                                                                   nodeOrientation = self.ueOrientation[ns,[[nue]]]).transpose(0,2,1,3,4,5,6)[0,0,0,..., np.newaxis,np.newaxis,:]@xprMtx[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, :,  :]@self.bsAntennaArray[nc].getFeildVectors(self.thetaAoD_mn[nc,[ns],[[nbs]],[[[nue]]]]*np.pi/180, self.phiAoD_mn[nc,[ns],[[nbs]],[[[nue]]]]*np.pi/180, nodeOrientation = -self.bsOrientation[ns,[[nbs]]])[0,0,0,...,np.newaxis,:,:,np.newaxis])[...,0, 0]*hn

                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,0,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 0,:,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,1,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 0,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,2,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 0,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,3,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices3,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,4,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices1,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,5,...]   = np.sum(hn[..., 1,indices2,:,:], axis=-3)
                                hchannel[nc,ns,nbs,nue,6::,...] = np.sum(hn[..., 2::,:,:,:], axis=-3)



        ## Load Parameters into ChannelGenerator Object

        channel = ChannelGenerator(self.fc, self.terrainBS_UE, self.locBS, self.locUE, 
                                   self.BSvelocityVector, self.UEvelocityVector)

        if(applyPathLoss):
                                     
            if(self.enableSpatialConsistencyForLSPs):
                obj = randnsc(shape               = self.fc.size,
                              correlationType     = self.correlationType[3,0],
                              correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[3,0],
                              memoryEfficeint     = self.memoryEfficient)
                self.pathLoss.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = self.pathLoss.transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] + (self.shadowFading*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS)).transpose(1,2,3,0)[self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]
                
                obj = randnsc(shape               = self.fc.size,
                              correlationType     = self.correlationType[3,1],
                              correlationDistance = self.correlationDistance[3,1],
                              memoryEfficeint     = self.memoryEfficient)
                self.pathLoss.transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] = self.pathLoss.transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE] + (self.shadowFading*obj(self.locUE, self.locBS)).transpose(1,2,3,0)[~self.linkStateVec_BS_UE]

            else:

                self.pathLoss = self.pathLoss+self.shadowFading*np.random.randn(self.fc.size, self.numOfSnapShots, 
                                                                                self.numOfBS, self.numOfUE)
                                           
            channel.coefficients = hchannel*(10**(-self.pathLoss[..., np.newaxis, np.newaxis, np.newaxis]/20))

        else:
            channel.coefficients = hchannel

        channel.delays           = self.pathDelay
        channel.BSvelocityVector = self.BSvelocityVector 
        channel.UEvelocityVector = self.UEvelocityVector

        return channel
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    def drc(self, theta, phi):
        x = np.sin(theta*np.pi/180)*np.cos(phi*np.pi/180)
        y = np.sin(theta*np.pi/180)*np.sin(phi*np.pi/180)
        z = np.cos(theta*np.pi/180)
        return np.stack((x,y,z), axis=-1)
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    def AoD(self, txLocations, rxLocations):
        numTx = txLocations.shape[-2]
        numRx = rxLocations.shape[-2]
        numSnapshots = rxLocations.shape[0]
        drcs  = np.tile(rxLocations, (1, numTx, 1)) - txLocations.repeat(numRx, axis = -2)
        e     = np.arctan2(np.linalg.norm(drcs[...,0:2], axis=-1), drcs[...,2]).reshape(numSnapshots, numTx, numRx)
        a     = np.arctan2(drcs[...,1], drcs[...,0]).reshape(numSnapshots, numTx, numRx)
        return np.stack([e, a], axis = -1)
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[docs]    def displayClusters(self,indices = (0,0,0), rayIndex = None, carrierIndex = 0, radiusTx = 1, radiusRx = 1, displayPlot = True):
        """
        Method to display clusters in simulation.

        Parameters
        ----------
        indices : int tuple
            Correspond to a positive integer tuple of size 3, where the first one corresponds to number of carrier frequencies, second one to number of BSs, and third one to number of UEs respectively.
            Defaults to (0,0,0).
        rayIndex : int or none.
            Corresponds to ray index.
            Must be a positive int. Defaults to None.
        carrierIndex : int
            Index correspond to number of carrier frequencies at which the simulation is being carried out.
            Must be a positive int.
            Defaults to 0, meaning the first carrier frequency is being considered.
        radiusTx : int
            Radius at which the transmitter (Tx) locations are being plotted. Must be a positive int and defaults to 1 meter.
        radiusRx : int
            Radius at which the receiver (Rx) locations are being plotted. Must be a positive int and defaults to 1 meter.
        displayPlot : bool
            A boolen variable, if true calls plt.show() function of matplotlib. Defaults to true.   
        """
        if(rayIndex is None):
            linkTerrain = np.array(["tdl","TDL","cdl","CDL"])
            if(np.isin(self.terrainBS_UE[0:3], linkTerrain)):
                drcRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn[indices], self.phiAoA_mn[indices])
                drcTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn[indices], self.phiAoD_mn[indices])
                
            else:
                
                drcRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn[carrierIndex][indices], self.phiAoA_mn[carrierIndex][indices])
                drcTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn[carrierIndex][indices], self.phiAoD_mn[carrierIndex][indices])

            fig, ax = plt.subplots()

            ax.scatter(self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0], 
                       self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1], color = "red", label = "Transmitter")
            ax.scatter(self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,0], 
                       self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,1])
            ax.scatter(self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0], 
                       self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1], color = "blue", label = "Receiver")
            ax.scatter(self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,0], 
                       self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,1])
            ax.legend()
            ax.grid()
            plt.show()
        else:
            linkTerrain = np.array(["tdl","TDL","cdl","CDL"])
            if(np.isin(self.terrainBS_UE[0:3], linkTerrain)):
                drcRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn[indices][:,rayIndex], 
                                 self.phiAoA_mn[indices][:,rayIndex])
                drcTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn[indices][:,rayIndex], 
                                 self.phiAoD_mn[indices][:,rayIndex])
                
            else:
                
                drcRx = self.drc(self.thetaAoA_mn[carrierIndex][indices][:,rayIndex], 
                                 self.phiAoA_mn[carrierIndex][indices][:,rayIndex])
                drcTx = self.drc(self.thetaAoD_mn[carrierIndex][indices][:,rayIndex], 
                                 self.phiAoD_mn[carrierIndex][indices][:,rayIndex])
            

            fig, ax = plt.subplots()

            i = 0
            plt.plot([self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,0][i], 
                      self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,0][i]],
                     [self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,1][i], 
                      self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,1][i]], 
                     ':', lw = 6, label = "Linking amongst Rays", zorder=1)
            
            for i in range(1, drcRx.shape[0]):
                plt.plot([self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,0][i], 
                          self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,0][i]],
                         [self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,1][i], 
                          self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,1][i]], ':', zorder=2)

            i = 0
            plt.plot([self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0], 
                      self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,0][i]],
                     [self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1], 
                      self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,1][i]], 
                     'g*-', lw = 6, label = "Departing Rays", zorder=3)
            plt.plot([self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0], 
                      self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,0][i]],
                     [self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1], 
                      self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,1][i]], 
                     'mo-', lw = 6, label = "Arriving Rays", zorder=4)
            for i in range(1, drcRx.shape[0]):
                plt.plot([self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0], 
                          self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,0][i]],
                         [self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1], 
                          self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,1][i]], 
                         'g*-', zorder=5)
                plt.plot([self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0], 
                          self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,0][i]],
                         [self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1], 
                          self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,1][i]], 
                         'mo-', zorder=6)

            ax.scatter(self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0], self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1], 
                       color = "red", label = "Transmitter", zorder=7)
            ax.scatter(self.locBS[indices[0:2]][0] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,0], 
                       self.locBS[indices[0:2]][1] + radiusTx*drcTx[...,1])
            ax.scatter(self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0], self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1], 
                       color = "blue", label = "Receiver", zorder=8)
            ax.scatter(self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][0] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,0], 
                       self.locUE[indices[0], indices[2]][1] + radiusRx*drcRx[...,1])

            ax.legend()
            ax.grid()

        if(displayPlot):
            plt.show()

        return fig, ax
